title: Rhubarb Coffee Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 c. rhubarb, finely cut", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and butter.", "Add egg and beat well.", "To creamed butter, sugar and egg, add alternately buttermilk with mixture of flour, salt and soda.", "Mix well.", "Add rhubarb and vanilla.", "Pour into greased 9 x 13-inch pan and add Topping."]

title: Buttermilk Brownie Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/3 c. cocoa", "2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 slightly beaten eggs", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["In a saucepan combine butter, cocoa and 1 cup water.", "Bring to a boil and stir constantly.", "Remove from heat.", "In a large bowl sift together flour, sugar, soda and salt.", "Stir in eggs, buttermilk and vanilla.", "Add cocoa mixture; mix until blended. Pour into a greased 15 x 10 x 1-inch pan.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 20 minutes.", "Immediately pour frosting over brownies; spread evenly."]

title: Buttermilk Pound Cake
ingredients: ["3 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. butter (2 sticks)", "2 c. sugar", "4 eggs", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Sift together flour, soda, baking powder and salt.", "Sift again. Cream butter with sugar until light and fluffy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.", "Blend in vanilla. Add flour mixture and buttermilk alternately and beat until smooth after each addition.", "Pour into greased and floured wax papered loaf pan. Bake in moderate oven at 350\u00b0 for about 1 hour and 10 minutes or until cake tester comes out clean.", "Remove from pan and cool. Dust with powdered sugar."]

title: Dump Pound Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. Crisco", "1 stick margarine", "5 large eggs", "2 1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. lemon flavoring", "1 tsp. butter flavoring", "1 c. buttermilk", "3 1/2 c. plain flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda"]
directions: ["Dump all ingredients in mixer; beat 10 minutes.", "Bake 1 hour and 15 minutes at 325\u00b0.", "Serves 25."]

title: "Old Fashion" Stack Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1/3 c. sorghum molasses", "1 beaten egg", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. sugar", "3 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. ginger", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream shortening with molasses.", "Add beaten egg.", "Mix all dry ingredients and add to creamy mixture.", "Add milk and vanilla. Beat to a stiff dough.", "Roll out to thickness of pie dough.", "Cut out with a scalloped pie pan.", "Place rounds of dough on a cookie sheet.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 12 to 15 minutes.", "Put together with sweetened applesauce."]

title: Rhubarb Buttermilk Cake
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. all-purpose flour", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 c. brown sugar", "1 egg, slightly beaten", "2/3 c. corn oil", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. chopped fresh or frozen rhubarb", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1/2 c. granulated sugar", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["Sift together first 3 ingredients in large bowl.", "Stir together in medium bowl the buttermilk, brown sugar, egg, oil and vanilla and then add to dry ingredients, stirring until just combined. Fold in rhubarb and nuts.", "Pour batter into 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan.", "Sprinkle with mixture of 1/2 cup granulated sugar, cinnamon and butter which you combined by stirring with a fork.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 40 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.", "Serve warm or cool."]

title: Ring Of Coconut Fudge Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. cooking oil", "2 eggs", "3 c. enriched all-purpose flour *", "3/4 c. unsweetened cocoa", "2 tsp. soda", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. hot coffee or water", "1 c. buttermilk or sour milk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1 c. powdered sugar", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 Tbsp. butter", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 to 3 Tbsp. hot water"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Generously grease and lightly flour a 10-inch tube or Bundt pan.", "Prepare filling; set aside.", "In large mixer bowl, combine sugar, oil and eggs.", "Beat 1 minute at high speed.", "Add remaining ingredients except filling; beat 3 minutes at medium speed, scraping bowl occasionally.", "By hand, stir in nuts.", "Pour half of batter into prepared pan.", "Carefully spoon prepared filling over batter; top with remaining batter.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 70 to 75 minutes until top springs back when touched lightly in center.", "Cool upright in pan 15 minutes; remove from pan.", "Cool completely; drizzle with glaze made by combining:"]

title: Mama'S Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1 stick butter", "2 c. flour", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "dash of salt", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "1 c. coffee", "2 c. sugar", "2/3 c. buttermilk", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. real vanilla"]
directions: ["Bring cocoa, coffee and butter to a boil; sift the flour, sugar and salt together.", "Add these dry ingredients to the coffee/cocoa mixture."]

title: Fudge Sheet Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "2 c. flour", "1 c. water", "1/4 tsp. salt", "3 1/2 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 sticks butter", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Set aside flour and sugar.", "Heat water, salt, cocoa and butter. Add the sugar and flour.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Bake 15 to 20 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 1/2 c. brown sugar, packed", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "2 c. flour", "1 1/2 c. rhubarb, coarsely chopped"]
directions: ["Beat butter, sugar, egg and vanilla until creamy.", "Stir soda into buttermilk; add to sugar mixture alternating with flour. Stir in rhubarb.", "Spread in greased and floured 9 x 13-inch pan. In small bowl, combine 1/2 cup sugar, 1 teaspoon cinnamon and 1 tablespoon melted butter.", "Sprinkle over batter.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 40 minutes."]

title: Coconut Jam Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "4 eggs", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "2 1/2 c. plain flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "2 tsp. allspice", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. raisins", "1 c. blackberry jam", "1 c. nuts", "1 c. coconut"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and eggs together, then add all other ingredients.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes.", "Makes 3 layers."]

title: Tea Cakes(Old Recipe)
ingredients: ["1 heaping c. sugar", "1 c. buttermilk (scant)", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 egg", "flour to make stiff dough (about 2 1/2 c.)", "3 heaping Tbsp. Crisco", "pinch of salt", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Beat sugar, Crisco and egg together. Add soda and baking powder to buttermilk and stir until it foams. Add to other mixture. Add vanilla and flour.", "Roll out and cut cookies.", "Bake in a", "400\u00b0 oven."]

title: Banana Nut Bread
ingredients: ["1/2 c. melted butter", "1 3/4 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "3 medium bananas", "1 c. nuts", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 Tbsp. buttermilk (or sweet milk if not available)"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Mash bananas and add last so that they will not turn dark.", "Bake at 300 degrees in a muffin tin or loaf pan."]

title: Sugar Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 egg", "1 c. sugar", "2 tsp. soda", "2 c. flour", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. vanilla", "pinch of salt"]
directions: ["Beat egg; add sugar and salt. Mix baking powder in the flour. Mix soda in buttermilk. Then pour into egg and sugar. Add butter and stir until mixed well. Add all to flour. Mix well; add flour until stiff dough. Roll real thin and sprinkle with sugar. Cut and cook in moderate oven until brown through. Makes 150 cookies."]

title: Mud Cake Chocolate Sheet
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. soda", "2 sticks butter", "1 c. water", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 eggs", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix all dry ingredients and set aside.", "Bring all liquid to a boil in a small saucepan.", "Pour into dry ingredients and mix. Bake in 9 x 13-inch pan at 350\u00b0."]

title: Banana Loaf
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. nuts", "2 eggs", "4 Tbsp. buttermilk", "1/2 c. butter", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 crushed bananas", "1 tsp. soda, dissolved in milk"]
directions: ["Crush bananas in large bowl.", "Mix in all other ingredients. Pour into lightly greased loaf pan.", "Bake 1 hour at 350\u00b0 or until knife comes out clean."]

title: Irish Soda Bread
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. sugar", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. baking soda", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 stick butter", "1 1/2 c. raisins", "1 c. buttermilk", "dash of nutmeg", "dash of cinnamon", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix first 5 ingredients; cut in butter with knife or pastry cutter.", "Add buttermilk, unbeaten egg and vanilla; also nutmeg and cinnamon.", "Pour into greased 9-inch cake pan (round).", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 minutes."]

title: Rhubarb Nut Bread
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. light brown sugar", "1/2 c. shortening", "1 egg", "1 c. sour milk", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 c. raw, diced rhubarb", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. melted butter"]
directions: ["Combine brown sugar, shortening and egg.", "In another bowl, combine milk with vanilla.", "Add milk mixture and sugar mixture alternately to flour, beating well after each addition.", "Fold in rhubarb and nuts.", "Turn batter into 2 greased and floured loaf pans.", "Sprinkle with sugar combined with melted butter.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 to 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes or until done."]

title: Banana Bread
ingredients: ["3/4 c. butter", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. (4 to 6) mashed bananas", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. buttermilk or sour milk", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream together butter and sugar (well).", "Blend in bananas, eggs and vanilla.", "Sift together flour, soda and salt.", "Add alternately with buttermilk, blending just until well combined. Fold in nuts, if desired.", "Pour into 2 greased loaf pans and bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour."]

title: Chicken And Dumplings
ingredients: ["4 Tbsp. shortening or lard", "1 1/2 c. sifted flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. soda", "pinch of sugar", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 egg, beaten", "1 large fryer, cut into pieces", "2 c. chicken stock (unsalted)", "2 c. water", "2 Tbsp. butter", "black pepper and salt to taste", "1/4 to 1 c. milk"]
directions: ["Cut shortening into flour.", "Combine 1 teaspoon salt, soda and sugar with flour.", "Make a well in center of flour.", "Add buttermilk and egg; mix as for biscuits.", "Roll into a ball.", "Put in freezer while chicken is cooking.", "Simmer, do not boil, seasoned chicken in water and stock until tender.", "Skin and debone chicken; set aside."]

title: Chocolate Buttermilk Squares
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/4 c. unsweetened cocoa", "1 c. water", "2 c. sugar", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "2 eggs, beaten", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 to 4 drops red food coloring (optional)"]
directions: ["In a saucepan, bring butter, cocoa and water to a boil.", "Cool."]

title: Buttermilk Pound Cake
ingredients: ["2 sticks butter", "3 c. sugar", "1/4 tsp. lemon flavoring", "1/2 tsp. butter flavoring", "1/4 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "5 eggs", "1 c. buttermilk", "3 c. flour"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and flavorings.", "Separate eggs and beat the yolks.", "Add soda, then flour and salt alternately with milk. Fold in beaten egg whites; mix."]

title: Chocolate Sheet Cake And Icing
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "3 eggs", "2 c. sifted flour", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1/2 c. butter or Crisco", "1 tsp. soda, dissolved in 1 c. boiling water", "2 sq. melted chocolate", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Cream shortening and sugar.", "Add unbeaten eggs, one at a time.", "Beat well after each is added.", "Add milk and flour alternately.", "Add chocolate and vanilla.", "Add water and soda last.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 in a greased and floured 1 x 12 x 15-inch pan."]

title: Jam Cake
ingredients: ["5 eggs, beaten well", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 tsp. cloves", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg", "1 c. nuts", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "3 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1 1/2 tsp. allspice", "1 c. raisins", "1 c. blackberry jam"]
directions: ["Cream butter; gradually add sugar, mixing well.", "Add eggs and mix well.", "Sift flour and add it to all the spices and salt. Dissolve soda in buttermilk and add to the flour mixture.", "Add this to sugar and butter mixture and beat after each addition. Add nuts and raisins and stir in jam evenly.", "Makes three 9-inch layers.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes."]

title: 7 Week Bran Muffins
ingredients: ["1 (15 oz.) Raisin Bran cereal", "5 eggs", "1 1/2 c. butter", "3 c. sugar", "3 tsp. vanilla", "1 qt. buttermilk", "5 c. flour", "3 tsp. salt", "3 tsp. soda"]
directions: ["Mix and store up to 7 weeks in refrigerator.", "Bake in greased muffin tins at 375\u00b0 for 12 to 17 minutes."]

title: Grandma Carter'S Prune Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter or other shortening", "1/2 c. oil", "1 c. buttermilk", "3 eggs", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. nutmeg", "1 tsp. cloves", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. cooked prunes"]
directions: ["Sift dry ingredients together except soda.", "Cream butter and sugar.", "Add eggs, vanilla and oil to butter and sugar.", "Mix soda with buttermilk.", "Mix all ingredients.", "Add cooked prunes.", "Bake in a mold at 325\u00b0 for 1 hour to 1 hour and 10 minutes."]

title: Hush Puppies
ingredients: ["2 c. cornmeal", "1 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. sugar", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 egg", "3/4 c. boiling water", "1/2 c. melted butter", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1/2 c. chopped onions"]
directions: ["Mix all together ingredients and drop by spoonfuls in hot oil. Fry until golden brown."]

title: Yummy Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. butter", "1/2 c. cocoa", "2 eggs, beaten", "2 c. all-purpose flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. water", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Stir together flour, sugar, soda and salt.", "In saucepan, combine butter, water and cocoa.", "Cook, stirring constantly until it comes to a rolling boil.", "Add boiling mixture to dry ingredients and blend with electric mixer.", "Stir in buttermilk, eggs and vanilla.", "Pour into greased 13 x 9 x 2-inch or 17 x 10 x 1-inch pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes.", "Leave in pan and while cake is very warm, pour warm icing over cake.", "Serve from pan."]

title: Old Time Cinnamon Jumbles
ingredients: ["1/2 c. soft shortening (part butter)", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. sifted flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix shortening, sugar and egg thoroughly.", "Stir in buttermilk and vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together and stir.", "Chill dough."]

title: Yeast Biscuits
ingredients: ["1/4 c. warm water", "1 tsp. sugar", "1 pkg. yeast", "3/4 c. butter, melted", "1 egg", "2 c. buttermilk", "2 tsp. salt", "5 c. flour", "3 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. soda"]
directions: ["Place water, sugar and yeast in small bowl and set aside.", "Add all the rest in a large bowl, then add items in small bowl.", "Mix all together and set in fridge for 15 to 20 minutes.", "Bake what you want now and leave rest in fridge; will stay good for a week.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes."]

title: Cocoa Cola Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. all-purpose flour", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "1/2 c. cola beverage", "1/4 c. buttermilk", "1 beaten egg", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. miniature marshmallows"]
directions: ["Combine flour and sugar in a 2 1/2-quart bowl; set aside. Combine butter, cocoa and cola in a 2-cup glass measuring cup. Microwave at High 2 to 2 1/2 minutes.", "Stir cola mixture into flour and sugar.", "Add buttermilk, egg, soda, vanilla and marshmallows; beat well.", "Pour into a greased 13 x 9-inch baking dish.", "Spread marshmallows evenly in batter.", "Microwave at High 10 to 12 minutes; rotate dish 1/4 turn at 2-minute intervals.", "Frost cake while hot with Chocolate Cola Frosting."]

title: Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "3 or 4 c. flour (enough to make a soft dough)"]
directions: ["Cream shortening and", "sugar;", "add egg, milk, dry ingredients and vanilla.", "Work so", "you", "can handle by adding 3 or 4 cups flour.", "Roll on a", "board 1/4 inch thick.", "Cut and bake on greased baking sheet for about 15 minutes at 375\u00b0."]

title: Coconut Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "7 eggs", "2 3/4 c. flour", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. soda", "dash of salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. coconut extract"]
directions: ["Cream the butter; gradually add the sugar and beat 10 to 15 minutes at medium speed.", "Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition."]

title: Chocolate Zucchini Cake
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. sifted flour", "1/2 c. baking cocoa", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. oil", "1 3/4 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 c. unpeeled, grated zucchini", "1 (6 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips", "3/4 c. nuts, chopped", "2 eggs"]
directions: ["Sift first 4 ingredients; set aside.", "Cream butter, oil and sugar until light.", "On medium speed, beat eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.", "Blend in vanilla.", "Add dry ingredients alternately with buttermilk to creamed mixture.", "Beat well after each addition.", "Stir in zucchini.", "Pour in 13 x 9-inch pan.", "Sprinkle with chocolate chips and nuts.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 55 minutes or until cake tests done."]

title: Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. margarine", "1 1/2 c. white sugar", "1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 egg", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 c. finely chopped rhubarb (I use 3 c.)", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Beat well margarine, 1 1/2 cups sugar, 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon, salt, vanilla and egg.", "Add alternately and beat well, flour, soda and buttermilk.", "Fold in rhubarb.", "Spread in 9 x 12-inch well-greased pan.", "Top with 1/2 cup sugar and 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon.", "Mix together and sprinkle on cake.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes or until done."]

title: Irish Soda Bread
ingredients: ["4 c. flour", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/4 lb. butter", "2 tsp. baking powder", "3/4 tsp. soda", "1 Tbsp. salt", "1 beaten egg", "1 1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 Tbsp. caraway seed", "3/4 c. currants"]
directions: ["Mix flour, sugar, butter, baking soda and salt in large bowl. Make a well in the center and add egg and buttermilk. Mix well. Blend in caraway seed and currants.", "Knead until smooth, 2 to 3 minutes.", "Form into 2 round balls and place on buttered cookie sheet.", "Brush with beaten egg.", "Bake in 375\u00b0 oven until well browned.", "Cool before cutting."]

title: Ole Tyme Cinnamon Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 c. sugar", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar; add egg.", "Stir in buttermilk and vanilla.", "Now add all dry ingredients except 1/4 cup sugar and 1 teaspoon cinnamon.", "Chill.", "Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart on greased cookie sheet.", "Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon. Bake 8 to 10 minutes at 400\u00b0."]

title: Rhubarb Bread
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. brown sugar", "2/3 c. salad oil", "1 egg, beaten", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. nuts", "1 1/2 c. chopped rhubarb"]
directions: ["Mix in given order.", "Put into two greased bread pans.", "Crumble 1 tablespoon melted butter and 1/2 cup brown sugar mixture on tops.", "Bake 1 hour at 350\u00b0."]

title: Chocolate Cake And Icing
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 stick butter or margarine", "1 c. water", "1/2 c. shortening", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 eggs, lightly beaten", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Combine first 4 ingredients.", "Bring butter, water, shortening and cocoa to boil.", "Pour over flour mixture and mix well.", "Add eggs, buttermilk and vanilla.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes in a 13 x 9-inch pan."]

title: Chocolate Devil'S Food Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. Crisco or butter", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 c. hot coffee", "3 c. flour, sifted", "1 Tbsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. cloves", "1 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. chocolate", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. red cake coloring"]
directions: ["Cream Crisco and sugar; add eggs.", "Sift and add flour and spices together with salt.", "Dissolve chocolate in hot coffee and soda in buttermilk.", "Stir until it foams.", "Add to other ingredients with vanilla and cake coloring.", "Bake 45 to 50 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Ice with your favorite icing such as chocolate, cream cheese or 7 minute icing."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. plus 2 tsp. butter", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "2 oz. red food coloring", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/4 c. plain flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1 c. plus 2 tsp. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "1 Tbsp. vinegar"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add eggs one at a time.", "Add coloring, cocoa and vanilla.", "Beat well; add sifted flour, salt and baking powder.", "Alternate flour mixture with buttermilk.", "Put soda in vinegar and sprinkle over batter; fold in until well blended (don't beat).", "Bake in three 8 inch pans at 350\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes."]

title: Italian Cream Cake
ingredients: ["1 stick butter", "1/2 c. shortening", "2 c. sugar", "5 egg yolks", "5 egg whites, beaten stiff", "1 tsp. salt", "2 c. flour (plain)", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 c. nuts", "1 c. coconut", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter, shortening and sugar well. Add slightly beaten egg yolks. Dissolve soda in buttermilk and add alternately with flour to which the salt has been added. Fold in egg whites. Add coconut, nuts and vanilla. Bake in 3 (8-inch) pans at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Aunt Sally'S Cocoa Drop Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. Crisco", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. chopped nuts", "1 3/4 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. cocoa"]
directions: ["Cream Crisco, sugar and egg.", "Add buttermilk, vanilla and chopped nuts.", "Sift flour, soda, salt and cocoa.", "Chill 1 hour. Grease sheets.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 8 to 10 minutes."]

title: Buttermilk Sugar Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "pinch of salt", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 egg", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "2 1/2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Mix together the sugar, butter, salt, vanilla and egg.", "Add the buttermilk-soda mixture with flour to first mixture.", "Mix just enough to be able to handle the dough.", "Roll out and cut. Sprinkle with sugar; place on cookie sheets.", "Bake in a 400\u00b0 oven until brown."]

title: My Best Rhubarb Pie(Rhubarb Grows Like A Weed, But Such A Tasty Weed!)
ingredients: ["3 c. rhubarb, trimmed, peeled and sliced", "2 large eggs (or 3 small)", "1 3/4 c. sugar", "4 Tbsp. flour", "juice and rind of 1/2 lemon *", "juice and rind of 1 orange *", "1 pie shell and top crust (unbaked)", "1 1/3 c. molasses", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 beaten egg", "1 c. softened shortening", "1 c. sour milk", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 rounded Tbsp. soda", "1 Tbsp. ginger", "1 Tbsp. cinnamon", "flour", "1 stick butter (margarine)", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "3 eggs, beaten", "1 tsp. vanilla", "pinch of salt", "1 unbaked pie shell", "1/2 c. melted butter", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 1/2 heaping tsp. flour", "1 1/2 c. milk", "2 egg yolks", "1 baked pie shell", "thin-sliced white bread", "any juicy berries", "sugar to taste", "green tomatoes, sliced thin (enough to fill pie plate)", "dash of nutmeg", "1/2 c. butter", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. flour", "1/2 c. vinegar", "crust (top and bottom)"]

title: Buttermilk Bread

title: Old Fashion Tea Cakes

directions: ["Sift-measure flour.", "Sift again with the other dry ingredients. Combine milk, slightly beaten eggs and vanilla.", "Add to dry ingredients, beating until smooth.", "Cover dough tightly and chill overnight or until cold.", "Turn dough onto floured surface and roll out to about 1/2-inch thickness.", "Cut out with round cookie cutter or into squares with a knife.", "Bake on ungreased cookie sheet in hot oven at 425\u00b0.", "Cool.", "They will be crisp when cool."]

title: Betty'S Brown Bread

title: Orange Slice Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "5 eggs", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. dates, chopped", "1 (1 lb.) pkg. orange slice candy", "2 c. chopped pecans", "1 (4 oz.) pkg. coconut", "4 c. plain flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add eggs one at a time.", "Add vanilla. Beat well.", "Add flour alternately with milk.", "Fold in nuts, dates and candy.", "Reserve 1/4 cup flour to coat dates, nuts and candy. Spoon into 10-inch tube pan.", "Bake 2 hours at 300\u00b0.", "Glaze while hot."]

title: Blackberry Jam Cake

directions: ["Cream sugar and butter; add all dry ingredients together. Alternate with buttermilk.", "Add beaten eggs, vanilla and blackberry jam.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until done."]

title: Buttermilk Gingerbread

title: Chocolate Sheet Cake

title: Rhubarb Cake

title: Kringla

title: Three Way Chocolate Cookies

title: Persimmon Pudding
ingredients: ["2 c. persimmon pulp", "2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 1/2 c. buttermilk", "1/4 c. cream", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/8 tsp. salt", "2 large eggs (beaten)", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 c. butter"]
directions: ["Add sugar to the persimmon pulp, then add beaten eggs, stirring well.", "Add soda to buttermilk and stir until foaming ceases.", "Add buttermilk mixture to the persimmon mixture and stir well.", "sift flour, salt, and baking powder into persimmon mixture and beat well."]

title: Banana Nut Bread
ingredients: ["1/3 c. shortening", "3/4 c. sugar", "2 ripe bananas, sliced", "1 egg", "2 c. sifted flour", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Cream shortening, sugar and bananas.", "Beat in eggs.", "Combine dry ingredients.", "Stir gently into egg mixture alternately with liquids.", "Fold in pecans.", "Pour into greased 10 x 6 x 3-inch pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour.", "Yields 8 to 10 servings."]

title: Rhubarb Crumb Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1 1/2 c. packed brown sugar", "1 egg", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk or 1 c. milk mixed with 1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 1/2 c. rhubarb, cut into 1/2-inch cubes", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["Mix the first 9 ingredients and top with a mixture of the last 3 ingredients.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 60 minutes."]

title: Gingerbread Deluxe
ingredients: ["1/2 c. soft butter", "3/4 c. dark molasses", "1 egg", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 1/4 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "2 tsp. ginger"]
directions: ["Mix the first 5 ingredients together. Sift the flour, salt, soda and ginger. Stir ingredients together until smooth. Pour into a greased and floured 9-inch pan. Bake at 325\u00b0. Serve hot with applesauce, whip cream or chocolate sauce."]

title: Coca-Cola Cake

directions: ["Sift together flour, sugar and cocoa.", "In a saucepan, combine margarine and Coca-Cola.", "Heat to boiling; pour this over dry ingredients.", "Don't heat.", "Don't use an electric mixer.", "Add salt, buttermilk, marshmallows, eggs and vanilla.", "Mix well."]

title: Banana Bread
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter or margarine", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. soda", "3 bananas, mashed", "1/2 c. pecans", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 3/4 c. plain flour", "4 Tbsp. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 to 60 minutes. Makes 2 (9 x 5-inch) loaves. Freezes real well."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["1 3/4 sticks butter", "2 eggs", "1 (1 oz.) bottle red food coloring", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vinegar", "1 oz. water", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 1/2 c. plain flour", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar; add eggs.", "Blend.", "Add food coloring, water and cocoa.", "Blend well.", "Add buttermilk, flour and salt gradually.", "Add vanilla.", "Beat well.", "Last add soda and vinegar and stir gently.", "Pour into greased and floured pans.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes.", "Cool completely."]

title: Mother'S Old-Fashioned Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter or oleo", "2 eggs", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla or lemon extract", "3 1/2 c. unsifted flour", "2 tsp. baking powder"]
directions: ["Cream sugar with shortening.", "Add beaten eggs.", "Dissolve soda in buttermilk.", "Sift dry ingredients.", "Add alternately with buttermilk to sugar mixture.", "Drop by teaspoon on greased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0; watch closely.", "Yields 6 to 7 dozen."]

title: Basic Molasses Cake
ingredients: ["2/3 c. butter or margarine", "1 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. unsulphured molasses", "2 1/2 c. sifted flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/3 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. cinnamon", "2/3 tsp. nutmeg", "2/3 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. buttermilk"]

title: Banana Walnut Cake
ingredients: ["1 3/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter or oleo", "3 egg yolks", "5 Tbsp. buttermilk", "4 crushed ripe bananas", "1 c. walnuts, chopped fine", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. soda", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. each vanilla and almond flavoring"]
directions: ["Cream together the sugar and butter. Add egg yolks.", "Mix other ingredients and add stiffly beaten egg whites last.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 or 325\u00b0 for 50 minutes or until done.", "Bake in tube pan.", "Do not ice."]

title: Chocolate Cake Squares

Mix together eggs, soda, vanilla and buttermilk.", "Add to cocoa mixture.", "Mix well.", "Pour into a greased and floured 15 1/2 x 11 1/2 x 1-inch pan.", "Bake for 20 to 25 minutes.", "Begin making the icing about 5 minutes before cake is done.", "Ice while cake is hot."]

title: Orange Fruit Cake

directions: ["Sweeten juice and pour slowly over cake after it is baked and still hot."]

title: Prune Cake

title: German Chocolate Cake

title: Rhubarb Cake

directions: ["Cream shortening", "and", "sugar.", "Add", "egg", "and", "vanilla.", "Sift dry ingredients and add alternately with buttermilk.", "Add rhubarb. Mix 1/4 cup sugar and", "1 teaspoon cinnamon and sprinkle on top of batter.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 to 40 minutes.", "Delicious warm with ice cream or milk."]

title: Banana Nut Bread
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "3 Tbsp. buttermilk or sour milk", "1 c. mashed bananas", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "3/4 c. nuts", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add beaten eggs.", "Add mashed bananas. Add sifted dry ingredients alternately with milk.", "Add nuts. Bake in loaf pan at 350\u00b0 for 40 to 60 minutes."]

title: Banana Nut Bread
ingredients: ["1/3 c. butter or margarine", "3/4 c. sugar", "2 bananas, sliced", "1 egg", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]

title: Chocolate Cake

title: Granny Stephens Tea Cakes

title: Rhubarb Bread
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. brown sugar", "2/3 c. oil", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 c. diced rhubarb", "1/2 c. nuts, chopped"]
directions: ["Combine first five ingredients and mix until blended.", "Sift flour, soda and salt in a separate bowl.", "Add rhubarb and nuts to liquid ingredients and add flour mixture.", "Do not overmix.", "Pour batter into 2 large or 4 small loaf pans, which have been greased and floured.", "Before baking, sprinkle top with cinnamon-sugar. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes."]

title: Apple Skillet Cake

directions: ["Sift together flour, salt, soda and sugar.", "Add oil, egg, vanilla, buttermilk, apples and pecans.", "Pour into lightly greased iron skillet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 40 minutes.", "Serve warm with butter or whipped cream."]

title: Chocolate Drop Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "2 sq. unsweetened chocolate (2 oz.), melted", "1/3 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 3/4 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. chopped nuts (if desired)"]

title: Aunt Sally'S Cocoa Drops

directions: ["Mix shortening, sugar and egg.", "Stir in buttermilk and vanilla. Stir dry ingredients together and stir into creamed mixture.", "Add nuts.", "Chill 1 hour.", "Heat oven to 400\u00b0.", "Drop with teaspoonful 2 inches apart onto lightly greased cookie sheet.", "Bake 8 to 10 minutes.", "Cool.", "Frost with icing."]

title: Grandmother'S Never Fail Recipe
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar (white or brown)", "1/2 c. shortening", "2 c. buttermilk", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 tsp. soda", "3 c. flour", "2 Tbsp. cocoa*", "pinch of salt"]
directions: ["*For Spice, omit cocoa and add 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon cloves, 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg and 1/4 teaspoon allspice."]

title: German Chocolate Pound Cake

title: Chocolate Sheath Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. butter or margarine", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. soda", "2 eggs", "1 c. water"]
directions: ["Measure and mix dry ingredients (except cocoa) into a large mixing bowl.", "Add buttermilk, eggs and vanilla; mix well.", "Mix water, butter and cocoa in saucepan; melt, but do not boil.", "Add to batter; blend well.", "Pour into a 17 x 11 x 3/4-inch sheet cake pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes.", "Cool and ice.", "Very moist."]

title: Chocolate Nut Sheet Cake

directions: ["Sift flour, sugar and salt together.", "Put butter, water and cocoa in pot; bring to a boil.", "Pour over flour and sugar mixture. In a bowl, mix eggs, soda, buttermilk and vanilla.", "Add to first mixture; mix well with electric mixer.", "Bake in greased, floured 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan for 20 or 30 minutes at 400\u00b0.", "Frost in pan as soon as removed from oven."]

title: Mom'S Favorite Doughnuts

directions: ["Beat eggs thoroughly.", "Add and beat in sugar and melted butter.", "Stir in buttermilk.", "Sift together flour, baking powder, soda and salt and add to egg-buttermilk mixture.", "Add vanilla and nutmeg.", "Chill dough at least 1 hour.", "Roll dough to about 1/3 inch thick.", "Cut and fry."]

title: Italian Cream Cake
ingredients: ["1 stick butter or margarine", "1/2 c. vegetable oil", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. chopped nuts", "1 c. Angel Flake coconut", "2 c. plain flour", "5 eggs", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Cream butter, oil and sugar until smooth.", "Add eggs, one at a time.", "Add flour, salt, soda and buttermilk.", "Mix well.", "Add nuts and coconut.", "Divide into 3 layers.", "Bake at 300\u00b0 until done."]

title: Banana Nut Bread
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. butter or margarine", "3/4 c. sugar", "1 egg", "3/4 c. or 2 medium sized bananas", "3 Tbsp. buttermilk", "1/2 c. broken walnut meat"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar, beat in eggs.", "Stir in bananas and butter, add dry ingredients and walnuts.", "Stir only until moist. Turn into loaf pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour.", "Store overnight before slicing if desired."]

title: Pound Cake

directions: ["Cream together the Crisco and sugar; add eggs one at a time, beating well after each one.", "Sift the dry ingredients together and add alternately with the milk and flavorings.", "Pour into a lightly greased and floured Bundt pan and bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Let cool for 15 minutes before removing from pan."]

title: Pound Cake
ingredients: ["3 sticks butter", "5 eggs", "1 Tbsp. water", "4 c. sifted flour", "1 tsp. lemon", "1/2 tsp. salt", "3 c. sugar", "1/4 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. butternut"]
directions: ["Cream butter (at room temperature, but not soft).", "Add sugar gradually.", "Cream until light and fluffy.", "Add egg one at a time, beating well after each addition.", "Dissolve soda in water; add to buttermilk.", "Add salt and flavorings.", "Add flour and buttermilk alternately; blend well.", "Spray tube pan with Baker's Joy.", "Pour in batter.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 to 350\u00b0 for approximately 1 hour and 20 minutes."]

title: Old Fashion Tea Cakes

directions: ["Grease a baking sheet lightly.", "Start oven 10 minutes before baking.", "Set to moderately hot, 415\u00b0 to 425\u00b0.", "Measure sugar and shortening and cream well.", "Add egg and beat until smooth and fluffy.", "Stir in nutmeg, vanilla and salt.", "Stir soda into buttermilk and add flour and buttermilk, a bit at a time.", "Begin and end with flour.", "Stir until smooth.", "Remove 1/3 of dough at a time to floured cloth and roll out about 1/8-inch thick. (Sprinkle with sugar.)", "Cut out and lift to pan with pancake turner.", "Bake 8 to 10 minutes (just blonde, not brown).", "Makes 36 Tea Cakes."]

title: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 1/2 c. sugar", "2 whole eggs", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. boiling water", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. cocoa", "2 tsp. soda"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add beaten eggs, milk and water.", "Put all dry ingredients into sifter and add to batter; which will be thin but okay.", "Bake in 350\u00b0 oven for 40 to 60 minutes.", "Test. Bake in greased long cake pan and ice when cool with Fudge Icing."]

title: Old-Fashioned Stack Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/3 c. sorghum molasses", "1 egg, beaten", "3 1/2 c. flour", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. ginger", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Cream shortening, sugar and molasses.", "Add beaten egg and vanilla; blend well.", "Sift together dry ingredients.", "Add alternately with milk, beating smooth each time to make a stiff dough.", "Roll out on floured surface to thickness of pie crust, cut in circles the size of bottom of pie pan.", "Place rounds of dough on cookie sheet; bake in preheated oven at 375\u00b0 for 12 to 15 minutes, or until golden brown.", "Put together with spicy, well sweetened applesauce while warm.", "Let stand for several hours before serving.", "Makes 9 layers."]

title: German Sweet Chocolate Cake

Sift flour, soda and salt and then add dry ingredients alternately with buttermilk to chocolate mixture, beating after each addition until batter is smooth.", "Fold in stiffly beaten egg whites."]

title: German Chocolate Pound Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. shortening", "4 eggs", "2 tsp. butter flavoring", "2 tsp. vanilla", "3 c. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 pkg. German chocolate"]
directions: ["Cream sugar, shortening, eggs, butter flavoring and vanilla. Add dry ingredients alternately with buttermilk and melted German chocolate.", "(Joy bakes hers in Bundt pan.)", "Grease and flour pan or spray well with Pam.", "Bake at 300\u00b0 for 1 1/2 hours.", "Cool cake some in pan or turn out immediately.", "This completely fills Bundt pan when baked."]

title: Christmas Jam Cake

directions: ["Mix all ingredients together and bake in 3 layers in 350\u00b0 oven for 35 to 40 minutes or until done.", "Cool."]

title: Rhubarb Cake

title: Bibber'S Corn Light Bread

directions: ["Mix all ingredients well and pour into a greased and floured tube or bundt pan and bake in a slow oven 55 - 60 minutes until browned."]

title: Dilliards Cake
ingredients: ["1 egg", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1/3 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "5 Tbsp. cocoa", "1/2 stick butter", "pinch of salt"]
directions: ["Beat egg. Add sugar. Melt butter and cocoa together. Add milk and flour alternately. Bake at 325\u00b0 for 20 minutes in two 8 x 8-inch pans. Line pans with wax paper. Allow paper to come up sides of pan. When cool, frost with the following Mocha Icing."]

title: Old-Fashioned Stack Cake

directions: ["Cream sugar and butter.", "Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each.", "Sift flour.", "Measure with dry ingredients and add alternately with buttermilk and vanilla.", "Divide into 6 or 7 parts. Roll out mixture on a well-floured board or pat in well-greased 9-inch pans.", "Bake at 450\u00b0 until slightly brown, 10 to 20 minutes. Spread each layer with filling.", "Let stand in covered container at least 12 hours before cutting."]

title: Fresh Apple Cake
ingredients: ["1/4 c. butter or margarine", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "2 c. diced apples", "1 c. sifted flour", "1 scant tsp. baking soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "3/4 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 c. nutmeats", "2 or 3 small bananas, broken into chunks", "2 c. sifted all-purpose flour", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "3/4 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. soft shortening", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 eggs, unbeaten", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 c. buttermilk or sour milk"]
directions: ["In a small mixing bowl, put bananas.", "Beat with mixer on No. 3 speed until mashed.", "Measure out 1 cup.", "Sift flour, baking powder, soda and salt together.", "Put shortening, sugar, eggs and vanilla into a large mixing bowl.", "Beat on No. 8 speed for 2 1/2 minutes, scraping bowl while beating.", "Stop mixer.", "Add buttermilk or sour milk.", "Add sifted flour mixture alternately with mashed banana while beating at No. 1 speed.", "Scrape bowl while beating and beat only enough to blend, about 3 minutes.", "Pour batter into prepared pans.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 35 minutes.", "Remove from pans and cool."]

title: Corn Bread
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. cornmeal", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 egg", "2 c. buttermilk", "2 Tbsp. drippings or butter", "1 large Tbsp. sugar"]
directions: ["Sift dry ingredients in bowl.", "Add buttermilk and egg, stirring until combined.", "Melt butter in skillet or baking pan. Pour in batter.", "Bake in hot oven (450\u00b0) for 20 to 25 minutes."]

title: German Chocolate Cake

title: Chocolate Italian Cake

title: Coca-Cola Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. plain flour", "2 c. sugar", "2 sticks butter", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 c. Coca-Cola", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. mini marshmallows"]
directions: ["Sift flour and sugar together.", "Heat butter, cocoa and Coca-Cola; pour over flour and sugar.", "Add all other ingredients except marshmallows and pour into a 10 x 13-inch pan.", "Add marshmallows on top.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 to 55 minutes.", "Let cool."]

title: Buttermilk Pound Cake
ingredients: ["3 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 sticks butter", "3 c. sugar", "1 c. buttermilk", "4 eggs, unbeaten", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter with sugar.", "Add eggs, one at a time, beating well to incorporate each one.", "Add vanilla.", "Add buttermilk alternately with the dry ingredients which have been sifted together.", "Beat until smooth."]

title: Italian Cream Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. Crisco", "1 stick butter", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla, butter & nut flavoring (Superior brand)", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. flour", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 to 2 c. coconut", "1 c. pecans, chopped", "5 eggs, separated", "1/2 c. maraschino cherries, chopped", "1 stick butter", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 box powdered sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla, butter & nut flavoring"]
directions: ["Beat egg whites stiff and set aside.", "Cream Crisco, butter and sugar.", "Add egg yolks one at a time and cream well.", "Slowly add buttermilk alternately with dry ingredients.", "Stir in flavoring, coconut, pecans and cherries.", "Fold in stiffly beaten egg whites and bake in 3 greased and floured 9-inch pans at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. May use Bundt pan or 9 x 13 cake pan.", "For icing, mix cream cheese and butter well.", "Add flavoring.", "Stir in sugar a little at a time until well blended.", "Add nuts."]

title: Crispy Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["3 c. flour", "1 heaping tsp. baking powder", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. margarine", "1 egg", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Sift flour, baking powder, sugar, soda and salt together.", "Cut in margarine.", "Add egg, milk and vanilla.", "Roll real thin.", "Bake in hot oven at 375\u00b0 for 8 or 9 minutes.", "Finely ground pecans may be added.", "If handled correctly, this recipe will yield 112 small tea cakes."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "1 oz. red food coloring", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 1/2 c. plain flour", "1 scant table salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. butter flavoring"]
directions: ["Cream shortening, sugar and eggs.", "Make a paste with coloring and cocoa.", "Add to mixture.", "Add salt and flour with buttermilk and vanilla.", "Alternately add soda and vinegar.", "Don't beat hard, just blend.", "Bake 30 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Bake in two 8-inch pans, greased and floured."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. all purpose flour", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 t. cocoa", "1 t. soda", "1 t. salt", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. oil", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 oz. (1/4 c.) red food coloring", "1 t. vanilla", "1/2 stick butter", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1 lb. box of powdered sugar", "dash of salt", "1/2 t. vanilla", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Place all ingredients in bowl. Blend eggs with fork. Add oil and blend again. Add all to dry ingredients and mix with wire whip until smooth. Add and blend buttermilk. pour equally into three greased and floured 8\" cake pans. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes. Cool ten minutes and remove from pans. Icing Mix together until light and fluffy:"]

title: Jam Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "1 c. buttermilk", "3 c. flour", "1 c. jam", "3 eggs", "1 tsp. soda, dissolved in milk", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. cloves", "1 tsp. allspice", "1 tsp. nutmeg"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar thoroughly.", "Add egg yolks and beat until smooth.", "Add 1 cup jam to this mixture; alternately sift in dry ingredients with buttermilk.", "Beat egg whites and fold into batter.", "Bake in two large cake pans or a tube pan in a 350\u00b0 oven about 1 hour.", "Blackberry or strawberry jam is used by this cook."]

title: Rhubarb Bread
ingredients: ["1 egg", "1 1/2 c. brown sugar", "2/3 c. oil", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 c. nuts", "2 c. raw rhubarb"]
directions: ["Mix egg, brown sugar, oil, vanilla and some buttermilk. Alternate dry ingredients and rest of buttermilk.", "Mix in nuts and rhubarb last.", "Bake 1/2 hour at 350\u00b0.", "Last 1/2 hour bake at 325\u00b0."]

title: Banana Nut Bread
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. soda", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1 2/3 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. bananas", "1/2 c. nuts", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Mix flour, baking powder, soda and salt together and blend. In another dish or pan, blend sugar, soft butter and vanilla. Then add your bananas, nuts, eggs and buttermilk to your dry ingredients.", "Blend everything together.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes."]

title: Old Fashioned Dried Apple Stack Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1 egg, well beaten", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/3 c. molasses", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "3 1/2 c. all-purpose flour, sifted", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. allspice", "1/2 tsp. cloves", "dash of nutmeg"]
directions: ["Thoroughly cream together sugar and shortening.", "Add egg, molasses and buttermilk.", "Blend well.", "Sift together dry ingredients and add to creamed mixture.", "Mix thoroughly and add vanilla.", "Chill dough until easily handled.", "Divide dough into 4 equal parts.", "Roll each about 9-inch circles and place in greased 9-inch cake pans in 350\u00b0 preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes or until done.", "When cool, spread layers with prepared dried apples."]

title: Apple Muffins
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. firmly packed brown sugar", "2/3 c. vegetable oil", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. diced apples", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 tsp. melted butter"]
directions: ["Combine the first 3 ingredients.", "In another bowl, combine buttermilk, soda, salt and vanilla; add to the sugar mixture alternately with flour, mixing after each addition.", "Fold in the apples and pecans.", "Pour into muffin papers in muffin pan. Combine sugar and melted butter; sprinkle on top of each muffin. Bake at 325\u00b0 for 30 minutes, or until cake tester comes out clean. Yields about 15 muffins."]

title: Mom'S Chocolate Layer Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. water", "1 stick butter", "3 Tbsp. cocoa"]
directions: ["In one bowl, mix flour, sugar and salt.", "In another bowl, mix eggs, soda, buttermilk and vanilla.", "In a saucepan, mix water, butter and cocoa.", "Bring to a boil.", "Mix together dry ingredients, egg mixture and hot mixture.", "Mix well.", "Pour into 9 x 13-inch cake pan (greased and floured) and bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes."]

title: Sweet Potato Pound Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. shortening", "3 c. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. allspice", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "6 eggs", "1 1/4 c. buttermilk", "1/2 c. softened butter or oleo", "3 1/2 c. plain flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. nutmeg", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 1/2 c. cooked sweet potatoes"]
directions: ["Cream shortening, butter and sugar. Add sweet potatoes and beat well. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each. Combine dry", "ingredients; add alternately with buttermilk. Grease and flour tube pan. Sprinkle 1/2 cup chopped nuts over bottom of pan; pour in batter and top with remaining pecans. Bake in preheated 350\u00b0 oven 1 hour and 10 minutes. Cool 10 minutes before removing."]

title: Rhubarb Muffins
ingredients: ["1 c. finely diced rhubarb", "1/4 c. sugar", "2 c. flour", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 egg", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1/4 c. oil", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Combine rhubarb and 1/4 cup sugar.", "Let stand 1 hour.", "Mix together flour, sugar, soda and salt.", "Beat together egg, buttermilk, oil and vanilla. Add to dry ingredients.", "Mix just until moist.", "Add rhubarb mixture."]

title: Cookie Sheet Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. butter", "1 c. water", "1/2 c. shortening", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Sift flour, sugar and salt.", "Set aside.", "Bring to boil the butter, water, shortening and cocoa.", "Pour liquid mixture over dry ingredients and beat."]

title: Lemon Blueberry Muffins
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. baking powder", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. frozen blueberries", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/4 c. butter", "1 egg", "1 tsp. grated lemon peel", "1/4 tsp. baking soda"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 400\u00b0.", "Grease muffin tins.", "Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and baking soda.", "Combine butter, egg, lemon peel, buttermilk and flour mixture. Fold in blueberries. Fill muffin cups about 2/3 full.", "Bake 20 to 25 minutes. Top muffins with lemon glaze."]

title: Williamsburg Orange Cake
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. flour", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 c. buttermilk", "3/4 c. soft butter", "3 eggs", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. golden raisins", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1 Tbsp. grated orange rind"]
directions: ["Measure all ingredients into bowl.", "Blend 1/2 minute on low speed.", "Beat for 3 minutes at high speed, scrape bowl constantly. Pour into pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0.", "(May be made in 9 x 13 x 2-inch pan or tube pan or two 9-inch pans.)", "Bake in 9 x 13-inch pan for 45 to 50 minutes and layers about 30 minutes."]

title: Pound Cake
ingredients: ["3 c. plain flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "4 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 tsp. lemon flavoring", "1 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Mix butter, sugar, eggs and flavoring.", "Add flour, soda, baking powder and salt alternately with milk to mixture.", "Bake in tube pan for 1 hour and 10 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Small Layer Cake
ingredients: ["3 c. sifted plain flour", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 c. butter (2 sticks)", "2 c. granulated sugar", "1 c. buttermilk", "4 eggs", "2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter.", "Add sugar.", "Cream together.", "Add eggs one at a time.", "Alternate flour and buttermilk, beginning and ending with flour.", "Add vanilla.", "Pour into 4 greased and wax paper-lined layer pans.", "Makes four thick layers.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes."]

title: Italian Cream Cheese
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter, softened", "1/2 c. shortening", "5 eggs, separated", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 c. flour, sifted", "1 c. flaked coconut", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. nuts"]
directions: ["Cream sugar, butter and shortening.", "Add egg yolks, beating after each addition. Dissolve soda in buttermilk and add alternately with flour to egg mixture.", "Add coconut.", "Fold in stiffly beaten egg whites.", "Add vanilla and nuts.", "Bake in three 8-inch greased and floured pans in a moderate oven at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes.", "Cool and frost with cream cheese frosting."]

title: Raspberry Coffee Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. baking soda", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 egg, lightly beaten", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. raspberry pie filling", "1/3 c. sugar", "1/4 c. all-purpose flour", "2 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["Grease and flour an 8-inch spring-form pan.", "In a large bowl, stir together 1 1/2 cups flour, 1/2 cup sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt.", "With a pastry blender or two knives, cut in 1/2 cup butter until pieces are the size of small peas.", "Make a well in the center of mixture and set aside."]

title: Blackberry Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. soda", "1 tsp. cloves", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "3 eggs", "1 c. blackberries, drained", "1 c. buttermilk", "3 c. flour", "1 tsp. nutmeg", "1 tsp. allspice", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar; add eggs and beat well.", "Add soda and spices to flour.", "Add buttermilk.", "Beat in berries.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes.", "Makes 3 layers in 8 or 9-inch pans."]

title: Banana Nut Bread
ingredients: ["4 c. sifted flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. baking powder", "4 ripe (black) bananas, mashed", "1 c. coarsely chopped nuts", "4 eggs, slightly beaten", "2 c. sugar", "1/4 c. sweet milk", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. melted butter", "2 c. boiling water", "5 tsp. soda", "1 c. shortening", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "4 beaten eggs", "5 c. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 qt. buttermilk", "4 c. all-bran cereal", "2 c. bran flakes", "2 c. raisins", "1 c. nuts, chopped"]
directions: ["Mix and cool first 2 ingredients.", "Cream and add next 3 ingredients.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

title: Italian Cream Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. Crisco", "1/4 c. butter or margarine", "2 c. sugar", "5 eggs, separated", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 small can Angel Flake coconut", "1 c. pecans, chopped"]
directions: ["Cream Crisco and butter.", "Add sugar and cream until smooth. Add egg yolks and beat well.", "Combine flour, soda and salt.", "Add to creamed mixture alternately with buttermilk, beginning and ending with dry ingredients.", "Stir in vanilla.", "Add coconut and pecans.", "Fold in beaten egg whites.", "Pour into 3 greased and floured 8-inch layer pans.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes.", "Cool on wire racks for 5 minutes before removing from pan."]

title: Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. rhubarb", "1/4 c. sugar", "3/4 c. shortening (part butter)", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1 3/4 c. brown sugar or white", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla", "2 eggs", "1 1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "3 c. flour", "1 to 2 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Chop the rhubarb into 1/4-inch pieces; sprinkle with 1/4 cup sugar and set aside.", "Cream the shortening, salt, 1 3/4 cups brown or white sugar and vanilla.", "Add the eggs.", "Add alternately the buttermilk, soda, flour and cinnamon.", "Mix in rhubarb.", "Bake in a 9 x 13-inch pan at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes.", "Add topping."]

title: Apple Bread
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "2 c. diced apples", "1/2 c. butter", "2 Tbsp. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. nuts"]
directions: ["Mix sugar, butter, eggs, buttermilk, vanilla and salt.", "Mix until smooth.", "Add apples, nuts, soda and flour, then mix the topping.", "Put the topping over bread before baking.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 to 60 minutes."]

title: Banana Bread
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "3 c. sugar", "2 2/3 c. mashed bananas", "1 1/3 c. buttermilk", "4 c. flour", "2 tsp. soda", "4 eggs", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix sugar, butter and eggs in mixing bowl.", "Add salt, soda, vanilla and flour.", "Stir in buttermilk and bananas.", "Mix well and pour into 3 loaf pans.", "Bake at 325\u00b0", "for 1 hour."]

title: Mary Jane'S Hush Puppies
ingredients: ["2 c. cornmeal", "1 c. flour", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "3/4 c. water", "1/2 c. melted butter", "1 egg"]
directions: ["Mix dry ingredients together.", "Beat together milk, water, egg, butter and onion. Add to dry ingredients, mixing well.", "Shape into balls and drop into hot deep fat until golden brown."]

title: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. cocoa", "1/3 c. shortening or oil", "1 egg", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["To make buttermilk, take one cup milk and add 1 tablespoon vinegar.", "Let set while you start mixing the batter.", "Stir occasionally.", "Cream shortening or oil with sugar and cocoa.", "Add eggs, stir well.", "Add buttermilk, then flour, soda, salt and vanilla.", "Mix well.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until done.", "Use 8 x 8-inch pan or whatever you have."]

title: Milky Way Cake
ingredients: ["8 small Milky Way candy bars", "2 sticks butter", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. pecans", "4 eggs", "1/2 tsp. soda", "pinch of salt"]
directions: ["Melt Milky Way in double boiler. Cream oleo and sugar. Add 1 egg at a time, mix well. Sift flour and pinch of salt. Add soda to buttermilk. Add flour and buttermilk alternately to butter, eggs and sugar mix. Add Milky Way bars and beat well. Add vanilla, pecans and bake in greased and floured pan in 300\u00b0", "oven for 1 1/2 hours."]

title: Red Velvet Cocoa Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter, softened", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 eggs", "1 Tbsp. red food coloring", "2 c. flour", "1/4 c. cocoa", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "1 Tbsp. vinegar"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and vanilla.", "Add eggs and food coloring; blend well.", "In separate bowl, combine flour, cocoa and salt; blend this into first mixture, alternately adding buttermilk, mixing to a creamy mixture.", "In a cup, stir soda into vinegar; fold this carefully into batter (do not beat).", "Pour into 2 greased and floured 9-inch cake pans.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 35 minutes.", "Cool completely.", "Frost with Fluffy Vanilla Frosting."]

title: Orange Slice Cake
ingredients: ["2 sticks butter", "5 eggs", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda", "4 c. plain flour", "8 oz. chopped dates", "1 lb. orange slices, cut up", "4 oz. coconut", "2 c. chopped walnuts", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "1 c. mixed candied fruit"]
directions: ["Take flour and mix orange slices, dates, coconut and candied fruit.", "Cream butter and sugar together, then add 1 egg at a time. Add remaining ingredients, then add flour mixture gradually. Preheat oven to 275\u00b0.", "Bake 3 hours in tube pan."]

title: Buttermilk Pound Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. (1 stick) butter", "1/2 c. shortening", "2 1/2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. sugar", "5 eggs", "3 c. plain flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 325\u00b0.", "Grease and flour 10-inch tube pan. Cream the butter and shortening together until light and fluffy. Add vanilla and gradually cream in sugar. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each. Sift dry ingredients together and add to creamed mixture alternately with buttermilk.", "Pour batter into pan and bake for 1 1/2 hours."]

title: Banana Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. baking powder", "2 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. nuts (if desired)", "1 egg", "1 c. ripe mashed banana"]
directions: ["Mix sugar, eggs and butter.", "Then mix in the other ingredients.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 about 40 minutes."]

title: Banana Cream Cake
ingredients: ["1 stick butter", "1 c. sugar", "2 mashed bananas", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1/4 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 egg", "6 Tbsp. brown sugar", "3 Tbsp. butter", "2 Tbsp. cream", "1/2 c. nuts"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and mashed bananas thoroughly.", "Add egg and beat well.", "Add flour, salt, soda and buttermilk and mix well. Then add vanilla."]

title: Chocolate Sheet Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt (if plain flour is used)", "1 stick butter", "1 c. water", "1/2 c. shortening", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["In large bowl, mix (stir) together flour, sugar and salt, if needed, real well."]

title: Orange Fruit Cake
ingredients: ["1 lb. pecans", "1 lb. English walnuts", "1/2 lb. cherries", "1/2 lb. pineapple", "2 (7 1/4 oz.) pkg. dates", "1/2 lb. butter", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "3 eggs", "3 c. plain flour", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/4 c. buttermilk", "grated rind of 1 large orange"]
directions: ["Mix first 5 ingredients; set aside.", "Combine remainder of ingredients.", "Combine both mixtures and bake at 250\u00b0 for 1 hour and then at 300\u00b0 for 2 hours."]

title: Colonial Gingerbread
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "1 c. molasses", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter or margarine, softened", "1 egg", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. ginger", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Grease and flour", "a 9 x 9 x 2-inch pan.", "In large bowl, measure all", "ingredients", "and", "mix at low speed until blended. Pour batter", "into", "pan", "and bake 1 hour.", "Cool.", "Sprinkle with powdered sugar."]

title: Waffles(Vafler)
ingredients: ["3 eggs, separated", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 c. sour cream", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 c. flour", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. soda", "salt to taste", "1 tsp. vanilla or cardamom", "1/2 c. melted butter"]
directions: ["Beat egg yolks until lemon-colored.", "Add sugar gradually and beat until creamy.", "Add sour cream and buttermilk.", "Stir in dry ingredients.", "Add flavoring and melted butter.", "Fold in beaten egg whites.", "Bake in waffle maker until golden color.", "Serve either hot or cold."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["3/4 c. butter", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "3 Tbsp. Crisco oil", "2 eggs", "3 oz. red food coloring", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. salt", "2 1/4 c. sifted plain flour", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "3 tsp. vinegar"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar; add eggs.", "Combine food coloring, cocoa and vanilla.", "Stir into cream mixture.", "Mix flour, salt and buttermilk.", "Add to creamed mixture.", "Combine soda and vinegar; ad to creamed mixture.", "Mix well.", "Pour into 3 (9-inch) round pans. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Kentucky Butter Cake...To Die For!
ingredients: ["3 c. sifted flour", "1 tsp. double-acting baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 tsp. pure vanilla", "1 1/2 c. butter", "3 c. sugar", "4 eggs (unbeaten)", "1/4 c. water", "1 tsp. vanilla or rum flavoring", "powdered sugar"]
directions: ["Sift together the flour, baking powder, salt and soda; set aside.", "Combine buttermilk and 2 teaspoons of vanilla; set aside. Cream 1 cup of butter, gradually add 2 cups sugar, creaming well. Blend in eggs, one at a time, beating well after adding each egg. Combine buttermilk mixture, alternating with the dry flour mixture, into the creamed butter mixture, beginning and ending with dry ingredients.", "Blend well after each addition (preferably with an electric mixer on slow speed).", "Turn into a 10-inch tube pan, greased on the bottom, or two 9 x 5 x 3-inch pans.", "Bake for 60 to 65 minutes or until cake springs back when touched in the center slightly.", "Run a spatula along the edge and stem of pan. Prick cake with a fork.", "Pour hot Butter Sauce over the cake (recipe follows).", "Cool before removing from the pan.", "Just before serving, sprinkle cake with powdered sugar."]

title: Strawberry Jam Cake
ingredients: ["2 eggs", "1 c. sugar", "2 c. flour", "1/2 c. butter", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "1 c. strawberry jam", "2 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar; add eggs and beat well.", "Add strawberry jam and mix well; add vanilla.", "Dissolve soda in buttermilk.", "Sift flour; add cinnamon, nutmeg and salt.", "Add flour mixture alternately with buttermilk to the creamed mixture.", "Bake in 9 x 13-inch pan at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 45 minutes."]

title: Rhubarb Coffeecake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 egg", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 c. rhubarb, diced"]
directions: ["Cream shortening and sugar together.", "Add rest of ingredients except rhubarb.", "Mix and then fold in diced rhubarb.", "Bake about 25 minutes at 350\u00b0 in 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Good with a light glaze."]

title: Daddy'S Pound Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/4 tsp. salt", "3 c. sugar", "4 whole eggs", "3 c. flour", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/4 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 Tbsp. water"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and salt.", "(Use mixer.)", "Add eggs one at a time.", "Add flour; alternate with buttermilk and soda.", "Add water and vanilla.", "Grease and flour tube pan.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for one hour or longer.", "Let cake cool."]

title: Chocolate Swirl Cake
