title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["1 to 2 bottles (1 1/2 oz.) red food color", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "1/2 c. butter", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "2 1/4 c. sifted flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. vinegar"]
directions: ["Mix coloring and cocoa.", "Let stand.", "Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs, then coloring-cocoa mix.", "Beat well.", "Sift together dry ingredients and add to creamed mixture alternately with milk.", "Stir in vanilla and vinegar; don't beat.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 in 2 (9-inch) or 9 x 13-inch greased pan for 35 minutes."]

title: Old Fashioned Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1 1/4 c. sugar, divided", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. all-purpose flour", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. chopped rhubarb", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["In a mixing bowl, cream butter and 1 cup sugar. Add egg; beat well. Combine buttermilk and vanilla; set aside. Combine flour, baking soda and salt. Add alternately with buttermilk and vanilla to the creamed mixture. Stir in rhubarb. Spread in greased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan. Combine the remaining sugar with cinnamon and sprinkle over batter. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes or until cake tests done."]

title: Buttermilk Pancakes
ingredients: ["1 1/4 c. flour", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. soda", "3/4 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 whole egg", "1 1/4 c. buttermilk", "3 Tbsp. Wesson oil", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Sift together flour, baking powder, soda, salt and sugar in 1 bowl.", "In another bowl, beat egg.", "Add buttermilk, Wesson oil and vanilla.", "Stir and add liquid ingredients to dry.", "Stir, leaving entire ingredients slightly lumpy.", "Bake on hot griddle (greased) until bubbles form.", "Turn once and bake other side or place on waffle iron until lightly browned."]

title: Great Grandma'S Banana Bread
ingredients: ["3/4 c. butter or margarine", "1 1/2 c. granulated sugar", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. buttermilk or sour milk", "1/2 c. chopped nuts (if desired)", "1 1/2 c. mashed ripe bananas (4 to 6)", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Cream together margarine and sugar, adding sugar gradually. Blend in the bananas, eggs and vanilla.", "Add sifted mixture to the creamed butter/sugar combination alternately with the buttermilk until all is well blended.", "Add nuts, if desired.", "Bake in 2 (9 x 5 x 3-inch) loaf pans at 350\u00b0 for about 1 1/2 hours.", "Makes 2 loaves."]

title: Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 egg", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. soda", "1 Tbsp. buttermilk", "2 tsp. vanilla", "3 c. flour"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients in a large bowl, then roll out and cut. Place on cookie sheet. Mixture will be soft. You may set in refrigerator until cool. Will be easier to work with. Roll lightly and cut. Bake at 350\u00b0 until lightly brown."]

title: Apple Bread
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1/4 c. butter", "1/4 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "2 eggs, well beaten", "1/2 c. nuts, chopped", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. flour", "2 c. chopped sour apples"]
directions: ["Cream the sugar and butter.", "Add buttermilk and soda.", "Add eggs, vanilla, salt and flour.", "Beat well.", "Fold in apples and nuts.", "Put in greased bread pan.", "Top with 2 tablespoons each of the oleo, sugar and flour plus 1 teaspoon cinnamon crumbled together.", "Press in slightly.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 to 50 minutes or until done.", "Serve warm or cold."]

title: Chocolate Sheet Cake
ingredients: ["2 sticks butter", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 c. water", "2 c. sugar", "2 c. flour", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Let butter, cocoa and water boil, then mix well.", "Add sugar and flour.", "Mix well.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Mix all together and put in long cake pan and bake at 350\u00b0.", "This makes a good cake."]

title: Banana Nut Bread
ingredients: ["1 2/3 c. sifted flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. softened butter", "1/4 c. buttermilk", "1 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "3/4 c. chopped nuts", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. ripe bananas, mashed"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and butter. Add eggs and mix well.", "Add rest of ingredients and mix.", "Put in loaf pan that has been greased and floured.", "Bake 45 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Milky Way Candy Bar Cake
ingredients: ["8 small Milky Way bars", "2 sticks butter", "2 c. sugar", "4 eggs", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. soda", "2 1/2 c. all-purpose flour", "1 1/4 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Put chopped candy and 1 stick butter in top of double boiler. Melt and set aside to cool. Cream the sugar, remaining butter and add eggs one at a time.", "Heat until light and fluffy. Combine flour and salt; stir in buttermilk along with soda. Alternate flour and milk into butter/egg mixture. Beat well. Add nuts, vanilla and candy bars.", "Mix well.", "Pour into a greased and floured Bundt pan. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 1 hour and 10 minutes. Frost with chocolate marshmallow frosting."]

title: Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. brown sugar", "1 egg", "2 c. flour", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "3 c. prepared rhubarb", "1/3 c. white sugar", "1 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Mix first 9", "ingredients in order given.", "Spread half batter in 13 x 9-inch baking pan.", "Add rhubarb and spread remainder of batter over the top.", "Sprinkle with white sugar mixed with cinnamon over it and bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 minutes."]

title: Creamy Coconut Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1/2 c. butter or margarine, softened", "2 c. sugar", "5 eggs, separated", "2 c. all-purpose flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2/3 c. flaked coconut", "pinch of cream of tartar", "Coconut-Pecan Frosting"]
directions: ["Cream", "shortening,", "butter", "and", "sugar\tuntil light and fluffy.", "Add egg yolks, one at a time, beating well after each addition.", "Combine\tflour,\tsoda", "and", "salt;", "add", "to", "creamed mixture alternately with buttermilk; beginning and ending with flour", "mixture.", "Beat", "well", "after", "each", "addition.", "Stir\tin vanilla", "and coconut.", "Beat egg whites until frothy; add cream of tartar and continue beating until egg whites are stiff but not dry.", "Fold\tegg", "whites into batter.", "Spoon batter into 3 greased and", "floured 9-inch cake pans.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes."]

title: Ice-Itself Chocolate Layer Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. flake coconut", "1/2 c. pecans, chopped", "1/3 c. packed light brown sugar", "3 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "3 Tbsp. evaporated milk", "2 Tbsp. light corn syrup", "1/2 c. butter or margarine, softened", "1 c. plus 2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 egg", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/4 c. plus 2 Tbsp. unsifted all-purpose flour", "1/3 c. Hershey's cocoa", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk or sour milk*"]
directions: ["Line two 8-inch layer pans with foil; butter foil.", "Combine coconut, pecans, brown sugar, 3 tablespoons melted butter, the evaporated milk and corn syrup in a small bowl.", "Divide mixture and spread evenly over bottom of each pan."]

title: Old Fashioned Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["3 c. flour", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "1 level tsp. soda", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1/2 c. butter", "1/2 tsp. salt", "flavor (grated orange rind, orange extract or any other flavor)"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and salt together.", "Mix soda, extract and beaten egg with buttermilk.", "Add to butter mixture, alternating with flour.", "If dough seems too soft to roll, add a little more flour.", "Roll to desired thinness, cut, place on greased cookie sheet and bake at 425\u00b0 until golden brown."]

title: Buttermilk Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or Crisco", "2 c. sugar", "4 eggs", "3 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. almond extract"]
directions: ["Cream together butter or Crisco and sugar. Stir together baking powder, buttermilk, soda and salt.", "Mix all together.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 33 minutes. Frost with Caramel icing."]

title: Prize Winning Persimmon Pudding
ingredients: ["2 c. persimmon pulp", "2 c. sugar", "2 eggs, beaten", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1 1/2 c. buttermilk", "1/4 c. half and half cream", "1/4 c. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream pulp and sugar and add beaten eggs, beating well.", "Put soda into buttermilk and salt until foaming ceases.", "Add to pulp mixture alternately with dry ingredients which have been sifted together.", "When all is blended, add the cream and butter.", "Mix well.", "Pour into greased pan and bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes to 1 hour."]

title: Red Velvet Cake And Icing
ingredients: ["1 c. butter and Crisco", "2 c. sugar", "2 eggs, beaten", "1 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "2 1/2 c. plain flour", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 oz. red food coloring"]
directions: ["Grease four cake pans. Sprinkle with flour. Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and beat until fluffy. Make a paste of cocoa and vinegar. Add to butter mixture. Sift salt, soda and flour together. Add to mixture, alternating with buttermilk. Add vanilla and coloring. Bake layers at 350\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes."]

title: Hershey Bar Cake
ingredients: ["8 plain Hershey bars (7/8 oz.)", "2 sticks butter", "4 eggs", "2 c. sugar", "2 1/2 c. plain flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. nuts"]
directions: ["Soften Hershey bars over", "hot water until they are limp (not runny) and", "soften", "butter.", "Cream", "butter and chocolate; add eggs.", "Mix dry", "ingredients.", "Mix", "some", "flour", "with nuts. Add dry ingredients alternately with buttermilk to the creamed mixture; add nuts.", "Bake in a tube pan at 325\u00b0 for 70 minutes."]

title: Chocolate Drop Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter", "1/3 c. buttermilk or water", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 egg", "2 oz. chocolate, melted", "1 3/4 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. baking soda"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 400\u00b0.", "Melt chocolate and mix ingredients. Drop by teaspoonful onto ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake for 8 to 10 minutes."]

title: Mom'S Sugar Cookies
ingredients: ["5 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. nutmeg", "1 c. butter or margarine", "3 eggs", "1/2 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Sift flour with 1 cup of sugar and next 4 ingredients, in a large bowl.", "Cut in butter (use hands).", "Beat eggs slightly and add rest of sugar to eggs, gradually.", "Blend in buttermilk and vanilla.", "Add and mix into first mix of flour.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 8 to 10 minutes, or until lightly browned on the bottom.", "Do not overbake."]

title: Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 1/2 c. brown sugar", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "2 c. flour", "2 c. chopped rhubarb"]
directions: ["Cream together the butter and brown sugar.", "Add the egg, buttermilk, soda, salt and vanilla.", "Fold in the flour.", "Add the rhubarb and nuts.", "Pour into a greased 9 x 9-inch square pan."]

title: Cream Cheese Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 c. sugar", "1 well beaten egg", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "2 Tbsp. buttermilk or plain yogurt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. sifted flour", "1/8 tsp. baking soda", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Blend until creamy the butter, sugar and egg.", "Beat in cream cheese, buttermilk or yogurt and vanilla.", "Add flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt.", "Beat well.", "Roll into slight 1-inch balls. Place on ungreased cookie sheet 2 to 3-inches apart.", "Using fork dipped in flour, press onto cookie and flaten slightly.", "Sprinkle with colored sugars or a cinnamon-sugar mixture.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 to 15 minutes or until set.", "Do not brown!", "Yields 60 (2-inch) cookies."]

title: Margie Thomason'S Lemon-Buttermilk Pound Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. Crisco", "1 stick butter", "2 c. sugar", "3 eggs", "3 c. flour, sifted", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 Tbsp. lemon rind, grated", "1 Tbsp. lemon juice"]
directions: ["Cream shortening; add sugar and beat.", "Add eggs, one at a time.", "Add dry ingredients, sifted together, alternately with buttermilk.", "Add flavorings.", "Pour into greased tube or Bundt pan. Bake at 325\u00b0 for about 1 1/2 hours."]

title: Coca-Cola Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sifted all-purpose flour", "2 c. granulated sugar", "3 heaping Tbsp. cocoa", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 stick butter", "1/2 c. cooking oil", "1 c. Coke (Classic)", "1/2 c. buttermilk or sour milk", "1 tsp. soda", "2 eggs, unbeaten", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. miniature marshmallows"]
directions: ["In a large bowl, sift together the flour, sugar, cocoa and salt.", "Bring to a boil the butter, oil and Coke, then pour over the sifted ingredients.", "Add the buttermilk or sour milk, soda, eggs and vanilla.", "Beat batter until smooth, then fold in marshmallows. Turn into greased 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Spread marshmallows around with spatula.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 to 50 minutes."]

title: Whoopie Pies
ingredients: ["4 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "3/4 c. cocoa", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. butter", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 c. hot water", "2 eggs", "2 tsp. soda", "2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Cream shortening and sugar.", "Add eggs, salt and vanilla. Dissolve cocoa in hot water; add to preceding.", "Dissolve soda and buttermilk.", "Add alternately with flour."]

title: Mom'S Rhubarb Coffee Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. oleo", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 1/2 c. flour", "3 c. rhubarb, drained if frozen", "1/2 c. walnuts", "1 c. brown sugar"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Grease 13 x 9-inch pan.", "Mix oleo, sugar, eggs, buttermilk, soda, vanilla and salt.", "Add flour and rhubarb mix.", "Pour into greased pan.", "Mix brown sugar and nuts; sprinkle over top.", "Bake 45 minutes or until knife comes out clean."]

title: Raisin Cake
ingredients: ["1 (15 oz.) box raisins, cooked and drained", "2/3 c. butter or margarine", "1 1/3 c. sugar", "pinch of salt", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. nutmeg", "1 tsp. allspice", "1 tsp. cloves", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "enough flour to make a medium stiff batter"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Cream butter and sugar; add eggs and beat. Add raisins, spices and vanilla; mix. Add buttermilk, soda and flour; mix well. Add little flour at a time to make a medium stiff batter. Bake 50 minutes. Baking time depends on oven."]

title: Pumpkin Nut Bread
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. flour", "1 1/4 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg", "1 c. pumpkin", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 egg", "2 Tbsp. softened butter", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Sift together dry ingredients.", "Combine pumpkin, sugar, buttermilk and eggs.", "Add softened butter; beat until well blended.", "Stir in nuts.", "Bake in a well-greased and floured loaf pan for 1 hour at 350\u00b0."]

title: Sugar Doughnuts
ingredients: ["2 eggs", "3 Tbsp. butter", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "3 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. nutmeg", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. lemon flavoring"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and shortening; add eggs; beat well.", "Add milk with soda.", "Add flour with baking powder, salt and nutmeg.", "(Use enough flour to handle easily.)", "Roll on floured board and cut out.", "Fry in deep fat."]

title: Buttermilk Cake
ingredients: ["2 sticks butter", "2 c. sugar", "3 eggs", "1/4 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 3/4 c. flour (plain)", "1/4 tsp. salt", "4 Tbsp. vanilla", "4 Tbsp. rum flavoring"]
directions: ["Cream butter with sugar.", "Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating after each one.", "Mix soda with buttermilk.", "Sift flour and salt three times before measuring; add to mixture.", "Add flavorings in small amounts at a time.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 1 1/2 hours in a tube pan lined with wax paper."]

title: Fudge Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "6 tsp. cocoa", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 c. flour", "1 c. hot water"]
directions: ["Sift dry ingredients together.", "Melt butter in one cup of hot water.", "Stir in dry ingredients. Add whole eggs and stir into mix. Add 1/2 cup buttermilk with soda.", "This makes a thin batter.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes.", "Use your own favorite chocolate icing."]

title: Italian Cream Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. Crisco", "1 stick butter or oleo", "2 c. sugar", "5 eggs, separated", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. coconut", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Cream Crisco, oleo (or butter) and sugar; beat until smooth. Add egg yolks; beat.", "Combine flour and soda.", "Add alternately with buttermilk.", "Add coconut and nuts.", "Fold in beaten egg whites that have been beaten until stiff.", "Pour in 3 layer cake pans, greased and floured.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes.", "Cool."]

title: Gumdrop Coconut Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "4 eggs", "3 1/2 c. all-purpose flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 c. pecans", "2 c. coconut", "1 lb. mixed gumdrops (no licorice)", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating well after each addition.", "Combine flour, soda and salt; add to creamed mixture alternately with buttermilk.", "Fold in nuts, coconut and chopped gumdrops.", "(If gumdrops are sticky, roll in about 4 tablespoons flour.)", "Add vanilla.", "Spoon into 2 well-greased 9 x 5 x 2-inch loaf pans.", "Bake at 300\u00b0 about 1 1/2 hours or until cake tests done."]

title: Mephistol Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1 1/2 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 egg", "2/3 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "salt", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. pecans", "2 1/2 c. (scant) flour"]
directions: ["Cream shortening, cocoa and sugar.", "Add egg.", "Add dry ingredients alternately with milk.", "Add vanilla and pecans.", "Bake in layers at 350\u00b0."]

title: Grandma Fore'S Buttermilk Pound Cake
ingredients: ["3 c. sugar", "1 c. butter (room temperature)", "6 eggs, separated", "2 tsp. vanilla or lemon extract", "3 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Grease and flour tube pan or Bundt pan. Mix together dry ingredients and set aside.", "Cream sugar and butter together with electric mixer.", "Add egg yolks, one at a time, mixing well after each addition.", "Add flavoring.", "Begin adding dry ingredients to creamed mixture, alternately with buttermilk, mixing well after each addition.", "Beat egg whites until stiff peaks and gently fold into batter.", "Pour batter into a tube pan or large Bundt pan (loaf pans may also be used, adjust baking times).", "Bake for 1 hour and 10 minutes or until cake test done."]

title: Phyllis' Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. soda", "2 eggs", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 oz. red food coloring", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 tsp. butter flavoring", "2 1/4 c. plain flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream shortening, sugar and eggs.", "Make a paste with food coloring and cocoa and add to the mixture.", "Add salt and flour with buttermilk and flavorings.", "Alternately add soda and vinegar and don't beat hard, just blend."]

title: Old Fashion Stack Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/3 c. molasses (sorghum)", "1 egg, well beaten", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "3 1/2 c. flour", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. ginger", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and shortening together. Add egg, molasses and buttermilk and mix well. Sift flour, baking powder, soda, salt and ginger together and add to other mixture. Roll real thin and bake."]

title: Buttermilk Pound Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. Crisco", "2 c. sugar", "3 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "3 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. lemon extract", "1 tsp. butter"]
directions: ["Cream the sugar and Crisco. Add eggs.", "Add dry ingredients alternately with milk.", "Add flavorings and butter.", "Bake in Bundt pan for 1 hour at 350\u00b0.", "Serve by itself or with toppings."]

title: Glorified Gingerbread
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter or oleo", "1 c. sugar", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. nutmeg", "2 Tbsp. molasses", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. ginger"]
directions: ["Mix butter, sugar, flour and salt with hands.", "Keep 1/2 cup for the topping.", "Mix rest with egg that has been beaten first and add rest of ingredients.", "Beat with electric mixer.", "Put in pan and put on reserved topping.", "Bake in a 9 x 13-inch loaf cake pan at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes or until springs back at finger touch."]

title: Whole Wheat Banana Nut Bread
ingredients: ["1 c. whole-wheat flour", "1/2 c. all-purpose flour", "1 tsp. soda", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. butter or margarine, softened", "3/4 c. sugar", "1 egg", "1 1/4 c. mashed bananas (3 large)", "1 c. pecans, chopped", "1/4 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Combine flour, soda and salt; stir well and set aside. Combine butter and sugar; cream mixture until light and fluffy. Add egg and mix well. Combine bananas and buttermilk; add to creamed mixture. Alternate with dry ingredients. Mix in chopped pecans. Stir until combined. Pour batter into greased and floured 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 minutes or until bread tests done. Cool 10 minutes in pan; remove to wire rack and cool completely. Wonderful to freeze and pull out anytime."]

title: Chocolate Chip Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "4 eggs", "3 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 (12 oz.) chocolate chips", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix flour with salt and cocoa; put soda in buttermilk.", "Cream sugar and butter; add eggs, one at a time. Add flour and buttermilk alternately. Add vanilla, chips and nuts.", "Bake in tube pan for about 1 hour and 15 minutes at 325\u00b0."]

title: German Chocolate Pound Cake
ingredients: ["3 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "4 eggs", "1 c. shortening", "2 tsp. butter flavoring", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 pkg. German sweet chocolate"]
directions: ["Cream shortening and sugar; add eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each egg.", "Add buttermilk and flavorings; mix and add dry ingredients, mixing well.", "Melt chocolate over double boiler. Add to cake mix and blend.", "Pour mixture into a greased and floured Bundt pan.", "Bake at 300\u00b0 for 1 hour.", "After turning out of pan, put a powdered sugar frosting glaze over it or eat plain."]

title: German Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1 (4 oz.) pkg. Baker's German's chocolate", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 1/2 c. plain flour", "1/2 c. boiling water", "1 c. butter or margarine", "4 egg yolks", "1/2 tsp. salt", "4 egg whites, stiffly beaten"]
directions: ["Melt", "chocolate", "in boiling water.", "Cool.", "Cream butter and sugar until fluffy.", "Add egg yolks, one at a time, beating well after", "each", "one.", "Blend", "in vanilla and chocolate.", "Sift flour with", "soda and salt.", "Add alternately with buttermilk to chocolate mixture,", "beating after each addition until smooth. Fold in beaten", "egg", "whites.", "Pour\tinto", "four (9-inch) layer pans. Grease", "and", "flour\tpans", "very", "well.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for about", "30 minutes.", "Cool and frost with Coconut-Pecan Frosting mix.", "Frost between layers and sides also."]

title: Banana-Nut Cake Royale
ingredients: ["1 c. shortening", "2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "1 c. mashed bananas", "2 c. cake flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. nuts", "1 c. flaked coconut", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1/2 c. cream", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 egg white", "1/2 tsp. coconut flavoring", "2 c. sifted confectioners sugar"]
directions: ["Cream 3/4 cup shortening with 1 1/2 cups sugar until fluffy. title: Moist Golden Cornbread
ingredients: ["1 c. flour", "1 c. corn meal", "2 Tbsp. sugar (optional)", "3/4 tsp. salt", "3/4 tsp. soda", "2 c. buttermilk", "1 egg, beaten", "1 Tbsp. butter, melted"]
directions: ["Heat oven to 400\u00b0.", "Mix flour, corn meal, sugar, soda and salt.", "Mix buttermilk and eggs.", "Stir buttermilk mixture and butter into corn meal until blended.", "Grease 8-inch square pan. Pour batter into pan.", "Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until golden on top and wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean."]

title: Italian Cream Cake
ingredients: ["1 stick butter", "1/2 c. Crisco", "2 c. sugar", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "5 eggs", "1 can coconut", "1 c. pecans, chopped", "1 Tbsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Beat until creamy butter, Crisco and sugar.", "Sift together flour, soda and salt.", "Beat 5 egg yolks and buttermilk. Alternately add buttermilk mixture and dry ingredients to Crisco and sugar mixture.\tFold in egg whites stiffly beaten.", "Bake in 3 greased and floured cake pans at 350\u00b0 for 25-30 minutes."]

title: Old Fashioned Jam Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. flour", "3 eggs", "1/2 c. butter", "1 1/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. cocoa", "1/2 lb. raisins (precooked)", "1/2 lb. pecans", "1 c. jam (your choice)", "vanilla", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar and add remaining ingredients.", "Bake in layer pans at 350\u00b0 until toothpick comes out clean."]

title: Kentucky Butter Cake(Makes 10-Inch Tube Cake.)
ingredients: ["3 c. sifted Pillsbury's Best all-purpose flour", "1 tsp. double-acting baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 c. Land O Lakes butter", "2 c. sugar", "4 unbeaten eggs", "1 c. buttermilk or sour milk", "2 tsp. Burnett's pure vanilla"]
directions: ["Sift together flour, baking powder, salt and soda.", "Cream butter.", "Gradually add sugar, creaming well.", "Blend in eggs, one at a time, beating well after each.", "Combine buttermilk and vanilla.", "Add alternately with the dry ingredients to creamed mixture, beginning and ending with dry ingredients.", "Blend well after each addition.", "(With electric mixer, use low speed.)", "Turn into 10-inch tube pan, greased on the bottom.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 60 to 65 minutes until cake springs back when touched in center.", "Run spatula along edge and stem of pan.", "Prick cake with fork.", "Pour hot Sauce over cake.", "Cool before removing from pan.", "Just before serving, sprinkle with confectioners sugar.", "Cake may be baked in 9 x 5 x 3-inch pans."]

title: Red Velvet Cake 2
ingredients: ["3/4 c. Crisco or butter", "2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 1/2 c. flour", "2 oz. red food coloring", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar; add eggs.", "Make a paste from cocoa and vinegar.", "Add buttermilk, flour and vanilla.", "Add coloring and cream well.", "Bake in three layers at 350\u00b0 for 25 minutes or until done."]

title: German Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1 pkg. Baker's German sweet chocolate", "1/2 c. boiling water", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "4 egg whites", "2 1/2 c. sifted Swans Down cake flour", "1 c. butter or margarine", "4 egg yolks, unbeaten", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Melt chocolate in 1/2 cup boiling water.", "Cool.", "Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.", "Add egg yolks, one at a time, and beat well after each.", "Add melted chocolate and vanilla.", "Mix well.", "Sift salt, soda and flour.", "Add alternately with buttermilk to chocolate mixture, beating well.", "Beat until batter is smooth."]

title: Old Tea Cake Recipe
ingredients: ["1 c. shortening", "1 egg", "1 c. sugar", "1/4 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "3 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix all together to make tea cakes.", "Roll out like biscuits. Cut with biscuit cutter.", "Bake in 350\u00b0 oven until golden brown."]

title: Banana Nut Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. melted butter", "2 eggs", "2 c. flour", "3 mashed bananas", "1/4 c. buttermilk", "1 c. chopped nuts", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "dash of salt"]
directions: ["Pour into greased and floured tube pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0."]

title: Great Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. flour, sifted", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "3/4 c. water", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "1/2 c. melted butter", "3 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla", "6 oz. melted unsweetened chocolate"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Put all ingredients in a bowl; mix well with electric mixer at medium-high speed.", "Pour into greased and floured pans; bake.", "Top with your favorite chocolate or white frosting.", "For cupcakes bake 15 minutes, for layers bake 30 minutes and 9 x 13-inch pan bake 40 minutes."]

title: Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. shortening", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "2 c. rhubarb, chopped", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts", "1/4 c. cinnamon sugar"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and shortening; beat in egg and vanilla, then add mixed dry ingredients.", "Fold in rhubarb and spread into 9", "x 13-inch greased pan.", "Sprinkle on nuts and cinnamon sugar; bake at 350\u00b0 for 40 to 45 minutes."]

title: Deviled Food Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. Crisco", "1 egg (white and yolk)", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "3 level Tbsp. cocoa", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Sift flour and measure; then sift flour, soda, salt and cocoa together 2 or 3 times.", "Cream Crisco, sugar, egg, buttermilk and vanilla.", "Mix dry and creamed mixtures and bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 minutes or until done."]

title: Old Fashion Sugar Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter or 1 stick oleo", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 - 4 c. sifted flour", "1 tsp. soda (sifted with flour)", "1/2 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar, add egg, buttermilk and flour, then vanilla.", "Place in refrigerator for a few hours.", "Then roll and cut out cookies.", "Place on greased cookie sheet and bake at 375\u00b0 for 10 - 15 minutes or until tops are beginning to brown."]

title: Milky Way Cake
ingredients: ["5 Milky Way candy bars", "1 stick butter", "2 c. sugar", "1 stick butter", "4 eggs", "1/2 tsp. soda", "2 1/2 c. plain flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Melt candy bars and 1 stick butter together over low heat and set aside.", "Cream together sugar and 1 stick of butter; beat well. Add eggs, soda, flour, salt, buttermilk and vanilla.", "Fold into mixture.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 60 minutes.", "Bake in a Bundt pan."]

title: My Buttermilk Brownies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/3 c. cocoa powder", "2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 slightly beaten eggs", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["In a saucepan combine butter, cocoa and 1 cup water.", "Bring to a boil, stirring often.", "Remove from heat.", "In a large mixing bowl, stir together flour, sugar, soda and salt; stir in eggs, buttermilk and vanilla.", "Add cocoa mixture, mixing until blended. Pour into a greased 15 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 1-inch baking pan.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 20 minutes.", "Immediately pour Cocoa-Buttermilk Frosting over brownies.", "Cool and cut into bars."]

title: Orange Candy Slice Cake
ingredients: ["2 sticks butter", "2 c. sugar", "4 eggs", "1 1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "4 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 lb. dates, chopped", "1 lb. orange slice candy, chopped", "2 c. mixed nuts, chopped", "1/4 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add eggs one at a time, beating well. Add 1 cup buttermilk.", "Beat well.", "Add soda to the other half cup buttermilk.", "Add to mixture.", "Combine dry ingredients.", "Add orange slices, chopped.", "Add dates, nuts and vanilla and blend.", "Grease and flour tube pan.", "Bake slowly 2 1/2 hours at 275\u00b0."]

title: Apple Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. flour", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "a little allspice", "1 tsp. soda", "1 egg", "4 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "buttermilk (enough to moisten)", "1 1/2 or 2 c. fresh chopped apples"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Pour into greased oblong pan.", "Start baking at 375\u00b0; reduce to 350\u00b0."]

title: Buttermilk Pound Cake(This Is A Very Moist Cake)
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "3 c. sugar", "1 c. eggs (about 5)", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 c. flour"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar, then add eggs.", "Cream for 10 minutes at medium speed on mixer.", "Add buttermilk, salt and soda. Alternate a little at a time with vanilla and flour.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for about 1 1/2 hours or until done to touch in loaf pans that have been oiled real good.", "When done, turn upside-down on sheet pan.", "It will drop from pan when it is cooled."]

title: Banana Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1/2 c. butter", "1 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. mashed bananas", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "3 c. sifted flour", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix shortening, sugar, eggs and vanilla thoroughly.", "Stir in bananas and buttermilk.", "Sift together the flour, soda and salt and stir in cream mixture.", "Blend in nuts.", "Chill for 1 hour."]

title: Fig Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. nutmeg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. fig juice", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 c. sugar", "2 c. sifted flour", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 qt. canned figs, drained and put through chopper", "1 1/2 c. ground pecans"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar; beat in eggs until smooth.", "Sift dry ingredients.", "Combine milk and fig juice.", "Add alternately to egg mix. Add vanilla and fold in figs and pecans.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 1 hour."]

title: Black  Magic Cake
ingredients: ["1 3/4 c all purpose flour", "2 c sugar", "3/4 c cocoa", "2 tsp soda", "1 c buttermilk", "1/2 c oil", "2 tsp vanilla", "1 tsp coconut flavor", "1 tsp baking powder", "1 tsp salt", "2 eggs", "1 c strong coffee", "1 tsp butter flavor"]
directions: ["Combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda, baking powder, and salt in a large mixing bowl:", "Add eggs, coffee, buttermilk, oil, vanilla, and flavorings.", "Beat at medium speed for 2 minutes (batter will be thin).", "Pour into oblong pan.", "Bake for 40 or 45 minutes at 350 degrees.", "Frost with favorite frosting."]

title: Hush Puppies
ingredients: ["2 c. cornmeal", "1 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. sugar", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 egg", "3/4 c. boiling water", "1/2 c. melted butter", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1/2 c. chopped onion"]
directions: ["Blend ingredients.", "Drop by small tablespoons into preheated deep fat.", "Cook until brown.", "Yield: approximately 30."]

title: Old-Fashioned Soft Sugar Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "1/4 c. melted shortening or margarine", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. soda", "2 c. flour", "1 1/4 tsp. baking powder"]
directions: ["Blend sugar, egg, salt and shortening together; add vanilla. Combine soda with buttermilk.", "Sift together baking powder and flour.", "Add buttermilk and flour mixtures alternately to sugar mixture.", "Drop on greased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes or less."]

title: Hot Fudge Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. Crisco oil", "1 stick butter", "1 c. water", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 c. plain flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["In large bowl, combine sugar, eggs and Crisco oil; beat until smooth.", "In a saucepan, combine butter, water, cocoa and salt. Bring to boil and set aside.", "Add to ingredients in large bowl buttermilk, flour, soda and vanilla.", "Combine mixture in saucepan to mixture in bowl.", "Do not use mixer after adding hot chocolate from saucepan.", "Pour into 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan and bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 40 minutes."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "1 oz. red food coloring", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 1/4 c. flour", "1 scant tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. soda"]
directions: ["Cream shortening and sugar; add eggs, mixing well.", "Make a paste with food coloring and cocoa and add to mixture.", "Add salt and flour with buttermilk and vanilla.", "Alternately add soda and vinegar; blend, don't beat.", "Bake 30 minutes at 350\u00b0 in two greased and floured pans (9-inch)."]

title: Bebe'S Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. shortening", "1 egg, well beaten", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. flour", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. boiling water"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and shortening together well.", "Add egg.", "Beat well and add the buttermilk.", "Sift the flour, cocoa, salt and soda together and add to the mixture.", "Add vanilla and lastly add the boiling water.", "Mix well and bake at 350\u00b0 until done in a greased 8-inch square pan."]

title: Banana Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg", "1 egg", "1 c. mashed bananas", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/2 c. all-purpose flour", "1 1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and nutmeg; add eggs, beating after each addition.", "Stir in bananas and vanilla.", "Combine flour, baking powder, soda and salt.", "Beat into creamed mixture alternately with buttermilk.", "Stir in nuts, pour batter into greased 13 x 9-inch pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 35 minutes."]

title: Orange Slice Fruitcake
ingredients: ["1 c. plus 2 Tbsp. butter", "2 c. sugar", "4 c. plain flour, sifted", "5 eggs", "1 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "1 lb. orange sliced candy", "1/2 lb. (8 oz.) chopped dates", "1 c. flaked coconut", "2 1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1 tsp. soda"]
directions: ["Sift", "flour", "and salt together.", "Have butter and eggs at room temperature.", "Slice", "orange", "candy\tto", "6 to 8 pieces per slice. Flour", "dates, candy, coconut and nuts with 1 cup of the flour. Put", "soda in buttermilk; stir.", "Cream butter and sugar, add", "eggs one", "at", "a\ttime, add milk mixture and flour mixture alternately. Add vanilla.", "Fold\tin floured mixture.", "Place in greased brown paper lined and floured tube pan.", "Bake in a 275\u00b0 oven for 2 1/2 hours.", "(May", "turn up temperature to brown last 10 minutes if needed.)"]

title: Hickory Nut Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. Crisco", "1/2 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "5 egg yolks", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. coconut", "1 c. chopped hickory nuts"]
directions: ["Cream together Crisco, butter and sugar.", "Add egg yolks, one at a time, beating after each one.", "Add flour, sifted together with soda and salt.", "Add alternately with buttermilk and vanilla. Stir in coconut and nuts.", "Fold in egg whites, beaten until fluffy.", "Bake in 3 greased and floured 9-inch pans at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Old Fashioned Tea Cakes(Cookies)
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1/3 c. shortening (or lard)", "1 egg", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/3 tsp. soda", "1/3 c. buttermilk", "2 1/3 c. all-purpose flour, sifted"]
directions: ["Grease baking sheet lightly.", "Preheat oven 10 minutes before baking; set to moderately hot (425\u00b0).", "Measure sugar and shortening into mixing bowl and cream well.", "Add egg and beat until smooth and fluffy.", "Stir in nutmeg, vanilla and salt.", "Stir soda in buttermilk and add flour and buttermilk alternately in 2 or 3 portions, beginning and ending with flour; stir gently until just smooth between additions.", "Remove 1/3 of dough at a time to a floured pastry cloth and roll out about 1/8-inch thick.", "Cut with 2 1/2-inch cutter and lift out with pancake turner onto baking sheet. Bake from 8 to 10 minutes.", "Makes 36 tea cakes."]

title: Fudge Cake
ingredients: ["1 stick butter", "1/2 c. water", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. flour", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. cinnamon", "pinch of salt", "2 small eggs", "1/4 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Bring butter and water to a boil.", "Mix sugar, flour, cocoa, soda, cinnamon and salt together.", "Add eggs, buttermilk and vanilla.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until done in 8 x 8-inch pan.", "Double recipe for 9 x 13-inch."]

title: Old-Fashioned Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. margarine", "1 1/4 c. sugar", "1 egg", "1 tsp. baking soda", "2 c. chopped rhubarb (can substitute peaches)", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["In a bowl, cream the butter and 1 cup of sugar.", "Add egg; beat well.", "Combine buttermilk and vanilla in a separate bowl.", "Combine flour, baking soda and salt.", "Add alternately with buttermilk-vanilla to creamed mixture.", "Stir in fruit.", "Spread in greased baking pan.", "Combine remaining sugar and cinnamon. Sprinkle over batter.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes."]

title: Chocolate Cookie Sheet Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1 c. water", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 eggs, well beaten", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon (optional)"]
directions: ["Sift together flour, sugar and salt.", "Put in saucepan or microwave and bring to a boil the butter or margarine, water and cocoa. Mix together eggs, soda, buttermilk, vanilla and cinnamon. Pour cocoa mixture over flour mixture.", "Add buttermilk mixture and mix well.", "Pour into greased jelly roll pan.", "Bake 20 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Blackberry Jam Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "2 c. flour (plain)", "3 tsp. baking powder", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. pecans, chopped", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/4 tsp. nutmeg", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 c. blackberry jam", "3/4 c. raisins", "1/2 pkg. frozen, chopped coconut"]
directions: ["Cream butter or margarine with sugar.", "Add well beaten eggs."]

title: Chocolate Dr. Pepper Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 c. Dr. Pepper", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "2 c. flour (cake)", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 eggs, beaten", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda"]
directions: ["Heat fat and Dr. Pepper. Sift together flour, sugar, cinnamon, salt and cocoa. Combine eggs, buttermilk, soda and vanilla. Add hot Dr. Pepper mixture to dry ingredients (blend well). Add egg mixture. Mix well. Pour in 15 1/2 x 10 1/2 pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 minutes."]

title: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. shortening", "2 1/2 c. sugar", "3/4 c. cocoa", "2 eggs", "3 c. flour", "2 c. buttermilk", "2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Blend first three ingredients.", "Add cocoa.", "Add eggs, one at a time.", "Add soda, salt and vanilla.", "Alternate flour and buttermilk, starting with flour.", "Bake in a 13 x 9-inch greased and floured pan at 350\u00b0 for 50 to 55 minutes."]

title: Banana Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "2 eggs", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 c. nuts", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. mashed bananas", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "4 Tbsp. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar thoroughly; add eggs and beat until fluffy.", "Add mashed bananas and flavoring; fold in dry ingredients alternately with buttermilk.", "Bake for 20 to 25 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Cinnamon Jumbles
ingredients: ["1/2 c. soft shortening (part margarine)", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix shortening, sugar and egg.", "Stir in buttermilk and vanilla.", "Sift and stir flour, soda and salt, then add to mixture and mix well."]

title: Green Tomato Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["2/3 c. butter", "1 3/4 c. sugar", "3 eggs (room temperature)", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 tsp. grated orange rind", "1/2 c. unsweetened cocoa", "2 1/2 c. flour", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 tsp. soda", "1 c. pureed green tomatoes", "1 c. broken pecans"]
directions: ["Cream together butter and sugar until fluffy.", "Add eggs, one at a time.", "Stir in vanilla and orange rind.", "Set aside.", "Combine cocoa, flour, baking powder, soda, salt and cinnamon.", "Alternately stir flour mixture, buttermilk and tomato into egg mixture.", "Fold in pecans.", "Bake in Bundt pan at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour.", "Cool.", "Glaze."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "2 1/2 c. all-purpose flour", "1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. Crisco", "3 eggs", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "2 bottles red food coloring", "1 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add eggs; beat until fluffy.", "Make paste of food coloring and cocoa.", "Add to butter mixture.", "Mix flour and salt.", "Add to mixture alternately with buttermilk.", "Add vanilla and mix well.", "Mix vinegar and soda (this will foam).", "Add to batter and gently stir until well mixed.", "Pour into 2 or 3 cake pans and bake in 350\u00b0 oven for 30 to 35 minutes."]

title: Pumpkin Nut Bread
ingredients: ["1 1/2 cups sifted flour", "1 1/4 teaspoon soda", "1 teaspoon salt", "1 teaspoon cinnamon", "1/2 teaspoon nutmeg", "1 cup pumpkin, canned or fresh", "1 cup sugar", "1/2 cup buttermilk", "1 egg", "1 cup chopped pecans", "2 tablespoons soft butter"]
directions: ["Sift together flour, soda, salt, and spices.", "Combine pumpkin, sugar, buttermilk and eggs in mixing bowl.", "Add dry ingredients and butter.", "Beat until well blended.", "Bake in 350 oven."]

title: Buttermilk Coffee Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/4 c. flour", "1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "3/4 c. granulated sugar", "1/2 c. walnuts", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. brown sugar, packed", "3/4 c. oil", "1 tsp. soda", "1 egg, slightly beaten", "1 1/2 c. dark corn syrup", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 c. finely chopped nuts", "5 to 6 c. flour", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1 tsp. cloves", "1 rounded tsp. soda, dissolved in 2 1/2 Tbsp. hot water"]
directions: ["Heat corn syrup to boiling; add butter and heat to boiling again.", "Cool slightly and add remaining ingredients.", "Dough should be stiff.", "Chill overnight.", "Make a long roll and cut off in small pieces about every 1/2-inch or so.", "Place about 1/2 to 3/4-inch diameter on lightly greased baking sheet.", "Bake as needed.", "Keep dough chilled.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 to 15 minutes; don't overbake. It should be firm when tested with finger."]

title: Old Fashioned Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "4 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar; add other ingredients, mixing thoroughly.", "Chill dough."]

title: Strawberry Bread
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter (1 stick)", "2 eggs", "2 c. sifted flour", "1/4 tsp. soda", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. strawberry preserves"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar until fluffy.", "Blend in vanilla.", "Sift together flour, salt and soda.", "Combine preserves, buttermilk and nuts.", "Bake 1 hour and 20 minutes at 350\u00b0 to make 1 loaf pan."]

title: Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. softened butter", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 c. flour (reserve 2 Tbsp.) to mix with rhubarb", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "2 c. diced rhubarb (fresh or frozen)"]
directions: ["Cream together butter, sugar and egg.", "Add buttermilk alternately with combined flour, soda, salt and cinnamon.", "Mix until smooth.", "Add vanilla.", "Toss rhubarb with flour.", "Add to mixture.", "Spread in greased and floured 13 x 9 x 2-inch cake pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes."]

title: Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. shortening", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "3 c. rhubarb, cut fine", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix together.", "Put in greased 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Sprinkle top with 1/4 cup sugar and 1 teaspoon cinnamon.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 35 to 40 minutes."]

title: Banana Cake

title: White Chocolate Cake

title: Cinnamon Coffee Cake

title: German Chocolate Cake

title: Red Velvet Cake

directions: ["Heat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Mix well shortening, sugar and egg.", "Stir in buttermilk and vanilla.", "Sift together dry ingredients and stir in.", "Spread in greased oblong pan 13 x 9 x 2-inch.", "Bake 20 to 25 minutes.", "When cool, frost with butter frosting.", "Cut into squares."]

title: Old-Time Cinnamon Jumbles
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening (part butter)", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "sugar and cinnamon"]
directions: ["Mix shortening, sugar and egg thoroughly.", "Stir in buttermilk and vanilla.", "Sift dry ingredients together and stir in.", "Chill the dough.", "Heat oven to 400\u00b0.", "Drop by rounded teaspoons, 2-inches apart, on lightly greased sheet.", "Sprinkle with a mixture of sugar and cinnamon.", "Bake 8 to 10 minutes until set, but not brown. Makes 4 dozen cookies."]

title: Soft Molasses Drop Cookies
ingredients: ["3 c. sifted flour", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. ginger", "1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 c. shortening", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg, unbeaten", "1/2 c. molasses *", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["*For a lighter color and flavor, substitute 1/2 cup cane syrup for the molasses."]

title: Bran Muffins
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. shortening or oil", "2 Tbsp. molasses", "1/2 c. sugar or 2 pkg. artificial sweetener", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 c. oat bran", "1 c. whole wheat flour", "1/2 c. unprocessed flour", "1/2 c. rolled oats", "1/2 c. raisins", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Combine oil, molasses, sugar, egg and vanilla and mix well. Add remaining ingredients and mix.", "Spoon batter in greased muffin tins, filling each two-thirds full.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes or until done."]

title: German Chocolate Pound Cake
ingredients: ["1 bar Baker's German sweet chocolate", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. shortening or 2 sticks margarine", "4 eggs", "1 c. buttermilk", "3 c. sifted all-purpose flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. imitation butter flavoring"]
directions: ["Partly melt chocolate over hot water.", "Remove and stir rapidly until melted.", "Cool and cream sugar and shortening.", "Add eggs, one at a time, with flour, flavoring and buttermilk (sift together flour, soda and salt) and add to shortening.", "Mix well. Blend in chocolate.", "Pour into a well-greased and floured tube pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 about 1 1/2 hours or until done.", "Remove from pan while still hot and place under tightly fitting cover until thoroughly cooled."]

title: Blueberry Buttermilk Muffins
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 1/4 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. soda", "1 egg, beaten", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/4 c. melted butter or margarine", "1 c. blueberries"]
directions: ["Combine dry ingredients in a mixing bowl; set aside.", "Combine egg, buttermilk and butter; mix well.", "Make a well in center of dry ingredients; pour in liquid ingredients.", "Stir just until moistened.", "Fold in blueberries.", "Bake at 425\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes."]

title: Buttermilk Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "3 c. flour", "4 eggs", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla or almond extract"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add eggs, beating after each addition. Add salt and vanilla.", "Alternately add milk and dry ingredients. Mix well.", "Bake in a Bundt or tube pan at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes."]

title: Banana Bread
ingredients: ["3/4 c. butter or margarine", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "1 1/2 c. mashed, ripe bananas (about 3 large)", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream the butter and sugar together.", "Beat eggs until light. Add to creamed mixture.", "Add mashed bananas and buttermilk, mixing well.", "Sift together the flour, soda and salt; add.", "Add nuts and vanilla.", "Bake in well-greased loaf pan (9 x 5 x 3-inch) in a 350\u00b0 oven for 1 1/2 hours."]

title: Sheath Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "2 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 sticks butter", "1 c. water", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 eggs, slightly beaten", "1 tsp. soda", "4 tsp. cocoa", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Sift together sugar, flour and salt in a large mixing bowl. Put butter, water and cocoa in saucepan. Bring to a boil.", "Pour over the sugar-flour mixture. Stir well. Add buttermilk, eggs, soda and vanilla.", "Mix well and pour in greased 9 x 14-inch pan. Bake 20 minutes at 400\u00b0."]

title: Jessie'S "Beam" Bars
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "3/4 c. brown sugar", "2 c. flour", "1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "3/4 tsp. salt", "3/4 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Mix the sugars and flour.", "Cut in butter.", "Combine 2 cups of this mixture with the nuts.", "Press into 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Combine the remaining ingredients and beat until smooth.", "Add remaining crumb mix and beat hard.", "Spread over unbaked layer in pan.", "Bake 30 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Cool, then frost.", "Cut into bars."]

title: Gingerbread
ingredients: ["2 c. plain flour, sifted", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1/4 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 egg", "2/3 c. molasses", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "2 tsp. ginger", "1/3 c. butter"]
directions: ["Mix flour, baking powder, soda, spices and salt together. Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.", "Add egg, molasses and milk, mixing well.", "Add dry ingredients; beat until smooth. Pour into an 8 x 8 x 2-inch pan; bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 minutes."]

title: Girl Scout Brownie'S Favorite Camp Brownie
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 3/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. oil", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. cocoa", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "2 c. shredded zucchini", "1/2 c. chocolate chips", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream together butter, oil and sugar.", "Blend in eggs, buttermilk and vanilla.", "Stir in dry ingredients (except chips and nuts) and zucchini.", "Pour into a greased and floured 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Top with chocolate chips and nuts.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 minutes."]

title: Jumbles
ingredients: ["1/2 c. lard", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix together lard and sugar.", "Add 1 egg and beat.", "Blend together with flour, soda and salt.", "Add buttermilk and vanilla and blend well.", "Drop by teaspoon and sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon or red hots.", "Bake 10 to 12 minutes at 400\u00b0.", "Makes 3 dozen cookies."]

title: Banana Nut Pound Cake
ingredients: ["3 c. sugar", "4 c. flour", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. butter", "4 eggs", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 c. bananas", "1 c. nuts", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix together and pour into a greased Bundt pan.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for about 1 hour.", "Check with a toothpick."]

title: Rhubarb Muffins
ingredients: ["1 1/4 c. brown sugar", "1 egg", "1/2 c. Crisco", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 c. diced rhubarb", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Combine first 5 ingredients, then stir in rhubarb and nuts, then combine last 4 ingredients.", "Stir this into rhubarb until blended.", "Spoon into muffin cups, 2/3 full."]

title: Cinnamon Jumbles
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Mix together shortening, sugar and egg.", "Stir in buttermilk and vanilla.", "(To make buttermilk, replace 1 tablespoon of milk with vinegar.)", "Sift together and stir in flour, soda and salt.", "Chill dough.", "Drop teaspoonfuls 2-inches apart on lightly greased pan. Sprinkle with mixture of 1/4 cup sugar and 1 teaspoon cinnamon. Bake until set but not brown.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 8 to 10 minutes."]

title: Strawberry Jam Bread
ingredients: ["3 c. plain flour", "1 tsp. salt", "3/4 tsp. cream of tartar", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter or oleo", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 c. chopped nuts", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. lemon juice", "4 eggs", "1 c. strawberry jam"]
directions: ["Combine flour, salt, cream of tartar and soda.", "Cream sugar, butter, vanilla and lemon juice.", "Combine the two mixtures.", "Add eggs, buttermilk and strawberry jam.", "Mix well, finally adding nuts.", "Pour in 2 (8 x 4-inch) loaf pans that have been greased and floured.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 55 minutes."]

title: German Chocolate Pound Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. shortening", "4 eggs", "2 tsp. \"Adams Best\" vanilla", "2 tsp. Adams butter flavoring", "1 c. buttermilk", "3 c. sifted all-purpose flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "4 oz. German sweet chocolate"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and shortening.", "Add eggs, \"Adams Best\" vanilla, Adams butter flavoring and buttermilk.", "Sift together flour, soda and salt and add.", "Mix well.", "Then add German chocolate that has been softened in warm oven or in double boiler.", "Blend together well.", "Bake in 9-inch stem pan or 10-inch Bundt pan, that has been well-greased and dusted with flour, about 1 1/2 hours at 300\u00b0 or until toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.", "Remove cake from pan while still hot and place under a tight fitting cake cover and leave covered until cold."]

title: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 egg", "1/4 tsp. salt", "4 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. sugar", "7 Tbsp. cocoa"]
directions: ["Mix flour, salt and cocoa. Cream butter and sugar. Add flour mixture. Mix in soda and buttermilk. Mix in egg and vanilla (don't beat egg). Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Buttermilk Persimmon Pudding
ingredients: ["2 c. pulp", "2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 1/2 c. buttermilk", "1/4 c. cream", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/8 tsp. salt", "2 large eggs, beaten", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 c. butter"]
directions: ["Add sugar to pulp, then add beaten eggs, stirring well.", "Then add soda to buttermilk.", "Stir until foaming ceases.", "Add buttermilk to first mixture and stir well.", "Sift flour, salt and baking powder into persimmon mixture and beat well.", "Add vanilla, cinnamon and cream.", "Put butter into pan to melt, pour into batter, except enough to grease pan.", "Beat well and bake in a 13 x 9-inch pan in slow oven for 45 minutes or until done.", "Bake at 350\u00b0."]

title: Cocoa Bars
ingredients: ["1/2 c. soft shortening (use part butter)", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg *", "3/4 c. buttermilk or sour milk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. sifted flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. cocoa"]
directions: ["Mix well the shortening, sugar and egg.", "Stir in buttermilk and vanilla.", "Add dry ingredients.", "If desired, can add nuts. Spread in rectangular pan.", "Frost and cut into squares."]

title: Sheath Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 c. water", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Sift flour and sugar together in a bowl.", "Put in a pan butter, cocoa, water and salt.", "Bring to a rapid boil.", "Pour over flour; stir well.", "Add milk, eggs, soda, cinnamon and vanilla.", "Mix well and pour in an 18 x 12-inch pan.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

title: Rhubarb Coffee Cake(Freezes Well)
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. white sugar", "1/2 c. shortening", "1 egg", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. cut up rhubarb"]
directions: ["Cream together shortening, sugar and egg.", "Add flour and salt. Mix soda with buttermilk and add flour alternately with buttermilk-soda mixture to creamed mixture.", "Blend well.", "Add vanilla and blend again.", "Fold in rhubarb.", "Pour into greased 9 x 13-inch pan and sprinkle topping over top and bake for 40 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Persimmon Pudding(Heritage Recipe)
ingredients: ["1 c. persimmon pulp", "1 1/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. soft butter", "2 beaten eggs", "2 c. flour", "2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "pinch of salt", "1 c. brown sugar", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1 1/2 c. water", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix the first 9 ingredients together in order and bake.", "Bake 350 degrees for 40 minutes.", "Just prior to taking out of oven; mix brown sugar, flour, water and vanilla in a saucepan.", "Cook until thick.", "Pour over pudding and bake an additional 15 minutes."]

title: Chocolate Drop Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "2 sq. chocolate (2 oz.),melted", "1 3/4 c. sifted Gold Medal flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda", "3/4 c. buttermilk or sour milk*", "1 c. chopped nuts (optional)", "1 tsp. vanilla (optional)"]
directions: ["* For sour milk, mix 1 tablespoon vinegar in measuring cup, then pour milk into to make 3/4 cup."]

title: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["4 c. plain flour", "1 tsp. salt", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. boiling water", "2 tsp. soda", "2 tsp. baking powder", "8 Tbsp. butter or lard", "1 c. buttermilk", "12 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter or lard with sugar.", "Mix plain flour, baking powder, salt, cocoa and soda.", "Add to sugar mixture, mixing with milk and hot water.", "After mixing batter, add vanilla.", "Bake in round cake pans and frost with brown sugar frosting or caramel frosting."]

title: Devil'S Food Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. cocoa", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 c. boiling water", "3/4 c. butter", "1 3/4 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add eggs, one at a time, and beat after each addition.", "Add milk and flour alternately.", "Add salt and vanilla.", "Stir in cocoa mixture.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Banana Bread
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter or margarine", "2 eggs", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 c. plain flour", "3 bananas, mashed", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 c. buttermilk or skim milk", "1 c. chopped nuts (your choice)"]
directions: ["Cream butter or margarine and sugar.", "Sift flour, salt and soda together.", "Add eggs.", "Add flour alternately with milk.", "Add vanilla and bananas.", "Stir in nuts.", "Bake in a tube pan at 325\u00b0 for about 1 hour.", "Test with straw to determine if done.", "If straw comes out clean, it's ready.", "Makes 2 small loaf pans."]

title: Red Velvet Cake And Icing
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. butter flavoring", "1 (1 oz.) bottle red food coloring", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 1/2 c. flour, sifted", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 Tbsp. vinegar"]
directions: ["Cream shortening, add sugar gradually and cream until light and fluffy.", "Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating vigorously after each addition.", "Add flavorings.", "Make a paste of cocoa and red food coloring and blend in.", "Sift dry ingredients together and add alternately with buttermilk.", "Add vinegar with last half of buttermilk.", "Beat only until smooth.", "Bake in 3 greased and floured 8-inch or 9-inch cake pans for 20 to 25 minutes at 350\u00b0 or until cake tester comes out clean.", "Cool 10 minutes and remove from pans.", "When cool, frost with Red Velvet Cake Icing."]

title: Easter Cake(Makes Three 9-Inch Layers)
ingredients: ["3 3/4 c. flour", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1 c. soft butter", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 tsp. lemon flavor", "1 1/4 tsp. vanilla", "4 eggs", "2 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Cut 3 (9-inch) circles of wax paper to fit layer cake pans; grease pans.", "Line bottom of pans with wax paper.", "Then grease and flour paper.", "Sift together flour, baking powder, soda and salt.", "Cream butter; add sugar.", "Cream until light and fluffy.", "Add flavorings.", "Blend well; add eggs, one at a time, beating after each addition.", "Mix in flour mixture alternately with buttermilk.", "Divide into pans.", "Bake for 25 to 30 minutes."]

title: Hush Puppies
ingredients: ["2 c. cornmeal", "1 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 c. butter", "1 egg", "3/4 c. water", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1/2 c. chopped onion"]
directions: ["Sift together first 6 ingredients; place in a small bowl.", "Add onion, buttermilk and water, mixing well.", "Add butter and egg. Drop by small teaspoonfuls into preheated deep fat."]

title: White Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. white chocolate", "1 c. butter or margarine", "2 c. sugar", "4 eggs", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. nuts", "1 c. coconut", "1/4 tsp. soda", "2 1/2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Melt white chocolate in microwave; let cool slightly.", "Cream butter and sugar until light.", "Add chocolate.", "Then add eggs, one at a time, beating after each.", "Sift dry ingredients and add to egg mixture, alternating with buttermilk.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour for angel food pan or 40 minutes for layered (three 9-inch round pans).", "Cool before icing."]

title: Chocolate Drop Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. margarine", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "2 sq. unsweetened chocolate, melted and cooled", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 3/4 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. chopped nuts, if desired"]
directions: ["Mix shortening, sugar, egg and chocolate thoroughly.", "Stir in buttermilk and vanilla.", "Stir together flour, soda and salt; blend in.", "Mix in nuts.", "Chill at least 1 hour.", "Heat oven to 400\u00b0.", "Drop teaspoonfuls of dough about 2 inches apart on a lightly greased baking sheet.", "Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until no imprint remains when touched lightly.", "Frost cooled cookies."]

title: Milky Way Cake
ingredients: ["7 (2 oz.) Milky Way candy bars", "1 stick butter", "1 stick butter", "2 c. sugar", "4 eggs", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. soda", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. nuts"]
directions: ["Melt Milky Way candy bars and 1 stick of butter together. Beat until smooth and set aside.", "Cream 1 stick butter with sugar and eggs.", "Mix in flour, buttermilk, soda, vanilla, salt and nuts. Fold in Milky Way mixture.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes in 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Cool and ice."]

title: Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. cooking oil", "1 egg", "2 c. cut up rhubarb", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Mix sugar and oil.", "Beat egg; add to mixture.", "Add rhubarb and milk.", "Sift flour, salt, soda and cinnamon; add to other mixture. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 to 40 minutes."]

title: Pumpkin Bread
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sifted plain flour", "1 1/4 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg", "1 c. pumpkin", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 egg", "2 Tbsp. soft butter", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Sift together flour, soda, salt, cinnamon and nutmeg.", "Combine pumpkin, sugar, buttermilk and egg.", "Add the sifted dry ingredients and soft butter.", "Beat until well blended.", "Stir in nuts.", "Spread in a well-greased 4 x 8-inch loaf pan and two individual loaf pans. Bake the larger loaf for 45 minutes to 1 hour at 350\u00b0 or until toothpick inserted in middle comes out clean."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 1/4 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "1/4 c. red food coloring", "2 tsp. cocoa", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/4 c. all-purpose flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. soda"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add eggs.", "Mix food coloring and cocoa.", "Add to sugar and butter mixture.", "Add buttermilk and vanilla with flour and salt.", "In a small bowl mix vinegar and soda together; fold into other ingredients.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes."]

title: Chocolate Buttermilk Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "2 c. all-purpose flour", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 stick butter", "1 c. vegetable oil", "1 c. cold water", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["In a large mixing bowl, sift together sugar, flour, cocoa, soda, and salt.", "Set aside.", "Bring to a boil; butter, oil, and water.", "Remove from heat and stir into dry ingredients.", "Add buttermilk, eggs, and vanilla.", "Mix well.", "Bake in greased and floured 9 x 13 inch pan at 325\u00b0 for 30 to 40 minutes.", "Ovens vary."]

title: Chocolate Cherry Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter or margarine, softened", "1 (10 oz.) jar maraschino cherries, undrained", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "2 c. all-purpose flour", "1/4 c. cocoa", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter.", "Add sugar; beat until fluffy.", "Add egg; beat. Drain cherries (save juice).", "Slice and set aside.", "Combine flour, cocoa, soda and salt.", "Add to creamed mixture alternately with buttermilk and cherry juice.", "Mix well.", "Fold in vanilla, pecans and cherries.", "Use 9-inch tube pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 minutes. Cool.", "Frost with cream cheese frosting."]

title: Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "2 c. flour", "2 c. finely cut rhubarb", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Mix ingredients.", "Sprinkle top with the 1/3 cup sugar and cinnamon.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes in a 9 x 13-inch greased and floured pan."]

title: Ma Davis' Buttermilk Pound Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "4 eggs, unbeaten", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. lemon", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. soda", "3/4 tsp. salt", "3 c. sifted flour", "1 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add eggs, one at a time.", "Beat at medium speed with electric mixer 2 1/2 minutes.", "Add flavoring. Sift dry ingredients together.", "Add to creamed mixture alternately with buttermilk.", "Beat 3 1/2 minutes at medium speed.", "Do not overbeat or cake will fall.", "Place in greased and floured loaf pan, 10 x 5 x 3-inches.", "May overflow if pan is too small.", "Bake in slow oven preheated at 300\u00b0 for 1 hour and 10 minutes or until done."]

title: Jane'S Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1 3/4 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "2 to 3 Tbsp. cocoa", "pinch of salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 c. melted shortening", "1 egg, unbeaten", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Sift together and add buttermilk, shortening, egg and vanilla. Beat well.", "Pour into greased tube pan and bake in 350\u00b0 oven for about 45 minutes.", "(Carob powder may be substituted for cocoa if a different flavor is desired.)"]

title: Moist Fudge Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "2 c. flour (self-rising)", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 sticks butter", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 c. water", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix sugar, flour and salt in mixing bowl.", "In saucepan, heat to boiling, butter, cocoa and water.", "Add buttermilk, then add all ingredients in bowl.", "Mix and pour into greased and floured sheet cake pan.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 30 minutes.", "Put icing on while hot right out of the oven."]

title: Coke Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "2 c. flour", "2 sticks butter", "1 c. Coke", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "1 1/2 c. small marshmallows"]
directions: ["Combine sugar and flour; set aside.", "Bring the next 3 ingredients to a boil and then let cool.", "Mix all the ingredients together.", "Pour in a 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Top cake with marshmallows after cake is done.", "Bake 35 to 45 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Ice cake while warm."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["2 eggs", "2 1/2 c. plain flour", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 sticks butter", "1 c. cooking oil", "2 tsp. cocoa", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 oz. red food coloring"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together. Put in two 10-inch cake pans."]

title: Brown Mountain Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. soft butter", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 eggs", "3 c. sifted all-purpose flour", "1 tsp. soda", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "1/2 c. warm water"]
directions: ["Cream your butter and sugar; beat in eggs, one at a time. Sift dry ingredients together.", "Add alternately with buttermilk to creamed mixture.", "Stir in vanilla and warm water."]

title: German Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "4 eggs", "2 1/2 c. all-purpose flour", "dash of salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 bar German sweet chocolate"]
directions: ["Melt chocolate in 1/2 cup boiling water and set aside.", "Beat egg whites until stiff and set aside. title: Williamsburg Orange Cake
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. all-purpose flour", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 c. buttermilk", "1/2 c. butter or margarine, softened", "1/4 c. shortening", "3 eggs", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. golden raisins, cut up", "1/2 c. finely chopped nuts", "1 Tbsp. grated orange peel", "Williamsburg Butter Frosting (recipe follows)"]
directions: ["Heat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Grease and flour baking pan (13 x 9 x 2-inch).", "Measure all ingredients, except frosting, into a large mixer bowl.", "Blend", "1/2 minute on low speed, scraping bowl constantly.", "Beat 3 minutes at high speed, scraping bowl occasionally.", "Pour into pan.", "Bake for 45 to 50 minutes.", "Cool. Frost cake with frosting."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "2 oz. red food coloring", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 1/4 c. plain flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. butter flavoring"]
directions: ["Cream shortening, sugar and eggs.", "Make paste of food coloring and cocoa.", "Add to cream mixture.", "Add salt and flour with buttermilk, vanilla, soda and vinegar.", "Do not overbeat, just blend.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "2 oz. red food coloring", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. butter flavoring"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and shortening until light.", "Add eggs.", "Sift flour, salt and cocoa; add alternately with buttermilk and 2 ounces red food color.", "Mix well.", "Fold in vinegar and soda mixture.", "Do not beat.", "Pour into 2 (8-inch) greased pans.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 35 minutes."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["2 sticks butter", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "2 oz. red food coloring", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/2 c. plain flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 tsp. baking powder"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and butter together and add eggs.", "Make a paste of cocoa and food coloring and add to the first mixture.", "Beat in part of the flour, milk and salt.", "Add the remaining flour and remaining ingredients, putting the soda and vinegar in last.", "Bake in layers at 350\u00b0 until tested done."]

title: Buttermilk Cookies
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. baking soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. butter", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Mix together flour, baking soda and salt; set aside.", "Cream butter and sugar, then add egg and vanilla; mix well.", "Add buttermilk alternately with dry ingredients and mix well. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes.", "When cool, glaze with Uncooked Chocolate Icing."]

title: Banana Cake
ingredients: ["3 to 5 bananas, mashed", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter", "2 eggs, beaten", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda in flour", "4 Tbsp. buttermilk", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and butter, then add mashed bananas and salt.", "Add flour and milk alternately, then add eggs.", "Beat well, then add vanilla.", "Grease and flour two 8-inch cake pans.", "Pour evenly in the pans.", "Bake 35 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "When cool, you may put the Banana Cake Icing on it."]

title: Apple Stack Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "1 c. butter", "6 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "3 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add eggs.", "Sift together dry ingredients; add to creamed mixture alternately with buttermilk. Add vanilla; divide into 6 parts.", "Pat into 9-inch cake pans that have been greased and floured.", "Bake at 450\u00b0 until lightly brown. Cool.", "Stack layers with dried apple filling, leaving top layer plain."]

title: Banana Nut Bread
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter", "3 eggs", "2 c. flour (plain)", "1/4 tsp. baking powder", "1 c. mashed bananas", "2 Tbsp. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "pinch of salt", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream sugar", "and", "butter;", "add", "eggs, one at a time and beat. Add", "milk and vanilla.", "Sift flour, salt, baking powder and soda together.", "Add", "flour.", "Mix", "nuts and bananas all at once and stir", "until", "mixed.", "Pour", "into greased loaf pan and bake at 325\u00b0 for 1 hour."]

title: Dried Apple Stack Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/4 c. molasses or brown sugar", "1 c. butter or margarine", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "6 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "3 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. ground cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg"]
