directions: ["Cream sugar", "and shortening;", "add molasses, vanilla and eggs and", "beat", "thoroughly.", "Sift together dry ingredients and add alternately", "with", "milk to creamed mixture.", "Divide batter into 6 equal", "parts", "and", "shape", "into round balls.", "Place each ball in the", "middle", "of a greased and floured 9-inch cake pan. Pat dough to edge", "of pan.", "Bake for 10 to 12 minutes at 375\u00b0. Cool layers slightly,", "about", "2", "minutes and remove from pan. Spread hot filling", "on", "top", "of each layer.", "Let cake ripen in closed container for 10 to 12 hours before serving."]

title: Buttermilk Brownies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/3 c. cocoa", "2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "2 slightly beaten eggs", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["In saucepan, combine butter or margarine, cocoa and 1 cup of water.", "Bring to a boil.", "Stir constantly.", "Remove from heat.", "In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, soda and salt.", "Stir in eggs, buttermilk and vanilla.", "Add the cocoa mixture; mix until blended. Pour into greased 15 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 1-inch baking pan.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

title: Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["1 egg", "1/2 c. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. soda", "6 Tbsp. buttermilk", "flour"]
directions: ["Cream", "butter, egg and sugar.", "Mix soda with buttermilk and add", "to", "mixture.", "Add", "vanilla.", "Add enough flour to make dough, roll out and cut.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 until brown."]

title: Cookie Sheet Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sifted flour", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 beaten eggs", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 stick butter", "1 c. water", "1/2 c. shortening", "3 Tbsp. cocoa"]
directions: ["In first bowl, add flour, sugar and salt. In 2nd bowl, eggs, soda, buttermilk and vanilla. In saucepan, bring butter, water, shortening and cocoa to boil; pour into ingredients in first bowl. Mix well. Mix ingredients in 2nd bowl and add to other ingredients. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes in a 15 1/2 x 10 1/2 floured and greased pan."]

title: Buttermilk Brownies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "1/3 c. cocoa (regular type, dry)", "2 c. sifted all-purpose flour", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "2 slightly beaten eggs", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["In saucepan, combine butter, cocoa and 1 cup water; bring to boil.", "Stir constantly.", "Remove from heat; in large bowl, sift together flour, sugar, soda and salt.", "Stir in eggs, buttermilk and vanilla.", "Add cocoa mixture.", "Mix until blended; pour into greased pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 about 25 minutes in 9 x 13-inch pan."]

title: Jam Cake
ingredients: ["2/3 c. butter", "1 c. sugar", "1 (10 oz.) strawberry jam", "3 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. allspice", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Cream margarine and sugar.", "Blend in jam, eggs and vanilla. Add flour, salt, soda and seasonings alternately with buttermilk. Mix well after each addition. If desired, fold in 1 cup flaked coconut.", "Pour into greased Bundt pan.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 55 to 60 minutes.", "Cool thoroughly and glaze with Brown Sugar Glaze."]

title: Billy Goat Cookies
ingredients: ["1 cup butter", "2 eggs", "2 1/2 cup flour", "1 Tbsp. soda", "1 Tbsp. cinnamon", "2 Tbsp. buttermilk", "1 1/2 cup sugar", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "1 lb. dates", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1 tbsp. cloves", "2 c. pecans"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar, and eggs, heat at medium. Temperature for 2 or 3 minutes. Add milk.", "Stir in pecans and chopped dates. Bake at 325\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

title: Old Fashioned Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1/3 c. vegetable oil", "3 Tbsp. cocoa powder", "1 stick butter", "1 c. water", "2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Boil oil, 3 tablespoons of cocoa, 1 stick butter, water. Mix in flour, sugar, salt, baking soda, eggs, buttermilk and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Bake in a 9 x 13 greased or sprayed pan at 400\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

title: Dad'S Bran Muffins
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 1/2 c. bran", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 1/4 tsp. soda", "1 to 2 Tbsp. orange rind", "2 c. buttermilk (1 Tbsp. vinegar to 2 c. milk to sour the milk)", "1 beaten egg", "1/2 c. molasses", "2 to 4 Tbsp. butter"]
directions: ["Combine and stir well the flour, sugar, bran, salt, soda and orange rind.", "Beat remaining ingredients. Combine dry and liquid ingredients with a few swift strokes. Fold in, before dry ingredients are entirely moist, the 1 cup nutmeats or 1 cup raisins and 1/2 cup mashed bananas.", "GREASE TINS WELL. Bake 25 minutes in 350\u00b0 oven. Yields 22 (2-inch) muffins."]

title: Buttermilk Pound Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. Crisco", "1/2 c. butter", "3 c. plain flour", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Cream Crisco, butter, and sugar.", "Add flour, salt, soda, buttermilk and eggs, one at a time.", "Add vanilla and mix well. Spray a Bundt pan with a nonstick spray.", "Pour batter into pan and bake in a 325\u00b0 oven for 1 hour or until tested done in center."]

title: Apple Muffins
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. packed brown sugar", "2/3 c. vegetable oil", "1 1/2 c. chopped apples, peeled", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 tsp. melted butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 egg", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Combine brown sugar, oil and egg in large bowl.", "Mix buttermilk with baking soda, salt and vanilla.", "Add to brown sugar mixture alternately with flour, mixing well after each addition. Fold in apples.", "Spoon into paper-lined muffin cups.", "Sprinkle with mixture of sugar and melted butter.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 30 minutes or until golden brown.", "Makes 24 muffins."]

title: Chocolate Nut Cake
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 c. sugar", "5 eggs", "1 c. walnuts", "3 sq. chocolate", "1 c. butter", "2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix together the sugar, eggs and butter, then add salt, soda, vanilla, chocolate and milk.", "Add flour, then walnuts.", "Pour in cake pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for about 25 minutes or until done."]

title: Chocolate Sheet Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. oil", "1 stick butter", "1 c. water", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "2 eggs, beaten", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Bring first 4 ingredients to a rapid boil. Add remaining ingredients. Mix well and pour in greased and floured loaf pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 minutes."]

title: Persimmon Pudding
ingredients: ["2 c. persimmon pulp", "2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/8 tsp. salt", "2 large eggs", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 c. cream (canned Milnot will do)", "1/2 stick butter"]
directions: ["Add sugar to persimmon pulp.", "Add well beaten eggs; stir well. Add soda to milk and stir until foaming ceases.", "Add milk to 1st mixture and stir.", "Sift flour, salt and baking powder.", "Sift into persimmon mixture.", "Beat well.", "Add vanilla, cinnamon and cream. Put butter into the pan your in and melt.", "Pour into batter. Reserve enough to grease pan well.", "Beat well and pour into baking pan.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 1 hour or until done."]

title: Rhubarb Muffins
ingredients: ["3/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. oil", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 c. nuts", "1 1/2 c. rhubarb, cut small", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1/4 c. nuts, chopped"]
directions: ["Beat first six ingredients.", "Sift together flour and soda. Add to first mixture.", "At the same time, add the nuts and rhubarb. Mix, just until moist.", "Put into 12 muffin tins."]

title: Maple Pecan Muffins
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "1/4 c. brown sugar, packed", "1 1/2 t. baking powder", "1/4 t. salt", "1 egg", "1/2 c. maple syrup", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1/2 t. baking soda", "1/3 c. butter or margarine, melted", "1 t. vanilla", "1 c. pecans, chopped", "1 T. sugar", "1/8 t. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Mix flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Beat egg and stir together the syrup, milk, baking soda, melted butter and vanilla. Add to flour mixture. Stir until moistened. Stir in pecans. Fill greased muffin pans 2/3 full. Mix cinnamon and sugar together and sprinkle over muffins. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 15-20 minutes."]

title: Favorite Chocolate Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. soft margarine", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "3/4 c. buttermilk or sour milk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 3/4 c. sifted Gold Medal flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. cocoa", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix margarine, sugar and egg thoroughly.", "Add buttermilk and vanilla.", "Sift together flour, soda, salt and cocoa; stir in.", "Mix in nuts, if desired.", "Chill at least one hour.", "Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls about 2 inches apart on lightly greased cookie sheet. Bake until almost no imprint remains when touched lightly with finger, 8 to 10 minutes in a 400\u00b0 oven.", "May be iced with chocolate icing.", "I use canned frosting if in a hurry."]

title: Chocolate Drop Cookies
ingredients: ["1 3/4 c. sifted flour", "1/4 tsp. baking soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 egg", "2 sq. unsweetened chocolate, melted", "1/3 c. buttermilk or sour milk", "3/4 c. chopped walnuts (optional)"]
directions: ["Measure flour, soda and salt; sift together.", "Cream butter. Gradually add sugar; mix until light and fluffy.", "Beat in vanilla and egg, then blend in melted chocolate.", "Alternately add flour mixture and buttermilk, mixing well.", "Fold in walnuts.", "Drop by teaspoon onto ungreased baking sheets.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes.", "Makes about 3 1/2 dozen cookies."]

title: Chocolate Sheet Cake
ingredients: ["1 stick butter or margarine", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "1/2 c. shortening", "1 c. water", "2 c. plain flour", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "2 eggs, beaten", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "Chocolate Icing"]
directions: ["In saucepan, melt and heat to boiling the butter, cocoa, shortening and water. In a large bowl, combine the flour, sugar, soda and salt.", "Combine and mix with cocoa mixture.", "In a small bowl, combine the eggs, buttermilk and vanilla.", "Combine and mix well with the other ingredients. Pour into greased 13 x 11-inch baking dish. Bake at 325\u00b0 for 30 minutes.", "Leave cake in pan. Cover with icing after removing cake from oven."]

title: Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "2 eggs", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "4 c. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "4 tsp. baking powder"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and butter; add eggs and beat well.", "Then add buttermilk and vanilla.", "Mix the flour, salt, soda and baking powder; slowly add to other mixture and stir until dough is stiff enough to roll out.", "If it is too sticky, add a little more flour. Roll to at least 1/4-inch thickness; cut with a cookie cutter or glass and bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes."]

title: Dried Fruit Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. buttermilk", "2 c. sugar", "4 eggs", "1 c. butter", "1 c. cooked dried apples", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "4 c. flour", "1 c. black walnuts", "1 box raisins", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. salt", "other spices to taste (optional)"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar together.", "Add cooked dried apples, buttermilk, soda, baking powder, salt, eggs, cinnamon and flour to creamed mixture and mix together well.", "Stir raisins and black walnuts into mixture.", "Pour into tube pan and bake 1 hour in a preheated 325\u00b0 oven.", "Cake can be baked in layers and stacked with icing."]

title: Coconut Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "5 eggs", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 3/4 c. flour", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. coconut flavoring", "2 recipes Never Fail Frosting", "2 c. coconut"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar and add eggs.", "Sift and add dry ingredients together; add to creamed mixture alternately with buttermilk.", "Bake in 3 greased and floured round 9-inch cake pans. Bake at 350\u00b0 for about 25 minutes.", "Cool and frost."]

title: Syrup Cookies
ingredients: ["3/4 c. butter Crisco", "1 c. brown sugar", "1 egg", "1/3 c. ribbon cane syrup or molasses", "1/3 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "4 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. ginger", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/4 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Cream shortening and sugar.", "Add egg, syrup, buttermilk and vanilla.", "Mix well.", "Sift flour, soda, baking powder, ginger, cinnamon and salt.", "Add to creamed mixture and stir until mixed well.", "Roll into balls.", "Dip into sugar.", "Press down slightly with glass dipped in sugar.", "Bake on greased cookie sheet at 375\u00b0 until slightly brown around edges."]

title: Granny'S Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "3 to 4 c. flour (enough to make soft dough)"]
directions: ["Cream shortening and sugar.", "Add egg, milk, dry ingredients and vanilla.", "Blend together.", "Roll on floured surface to about 1/8-inch thickness.", "Cut and place on greased baking sheet.", "Bake 15 minutes in a 375\u00b0 oven."]

title: Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["1/2 c. margarine or butter", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 egg", "1 tsp. soda", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 or 4 c. flour"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add egg, milk and dry ingredients. Blend.", "Roll out and cut out.", "Bake on ungreased pan 15 minutes in 375\u00b0 oven."]

title: Poppy Seed Loaf Cake
ingredients: ["3 c. flour", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "3 eggs", "1 1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 1/4 c. cooking oil", "2 1/3 c. sugar", "1 1/2 Tbsp. poppy seed", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 tsp. almond extract", "1 1/2 tsp. butter extract"]
directions: ["Mix well with electric beater.", "Pour into 2 lightly greased loaf pans and bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 to 60 minutes."]

title: Sharon'S Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. plain flour", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. water", "1 stick butter", "1/2 c. oil", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Melt", "butter", "in a saucepan.", "Add water and oil.", "Bring to a boil.", "Mix a little at", "a time with dry ingredients.", "Add eggs, buttermilk and vanilla.", "Pour", "in", "a", "greased sheet cake pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Poppy Seed Cake
ingredients: ["1/3 c. poppy seed", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 c. butter, softened", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "4 eggs", "2 1/2 c. all-purpose flour", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Combine poppy seed and buttermilk; soak overnight in refrigerator.", "Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.", "Add eggs, one at a time, beating after each addition.", "Combine flour, baking powder, soda and salt.", "Add vanilla to buttermilk mixture. Add dry ingredients and buttermilk mixture alternately to creamed mixture.", "Pour batter into greased and floured tube pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour or until cake tests done.", "Cool in pan 10 minutes before removing."]

title: Williamsburg Orange Cake
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. flour", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 c. buttermilk", "1/2 c. butter *", "1/4 c. shortening *", "3 eggs", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 fine chopped nuts", "1 Tbsp. grated orange peel"]
directions: ["*Or all softened butter."]

title: Sheet Cake
ingredients: ["3 c. flour", "1 c. sugar", "1 stick butter", "1/2 c. shortening", "1/2 c. water", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Boil shortening and water; cool down some.", "Cream sugar and butter.", "Add cocoa and salt to shortening and water.", "Add sugar and butter; when ingredients are about room temperature, add eggs, flour, soda, vanilla, milk and cinnamon.", "Bake on greased cookie sheet 20 minutes at 400\u00b0."]

title: Chocolate Drop Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "1/2 c. cocoa", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 3/4 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. baking soda"]
directions: ["Cream together the butter, sugar and egg. Stir in cocoa.", "Add buttermilk, vanilla, flour and salt.", "Mix well.", "Chill dough 1 hour.", "Drop onto cookie sheets by rounded teaspoonfuls.", "Bake 8 to 10 minutes at 400\u00b0.", "After cookies cool, can be topped with your favorite chocolate frosting."]

title: Blueberry Muffins
ingredients: ["3/4 stick butter", "1 3/4 c. flour", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. baking soda", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 Tbsp. grated orange peel", "1 c. blueberries"]
directions: ["Melt 3/4 stick butter.", "Sift together flour, sugar, salt and baking soda.", "Add egg, buttermilk, vanilla, melted butter and grated orange peel.", "Fold in blueberries.", "Fill 12 well buttered muffin tins 3/4 full.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 25 minutes.", "Makes 12 muffins."]

title: Old Fashioned Stack Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/3 c. sorghum molasses", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 beaten egg", "3 1/2 c. flour", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. ginger", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream shortening with molasses.", "Add beaten egg.", "Mix all dry ingredients and add with milk.", "Beat to a stiff dough.", "Roll out to thickness of pie dough.", "Cut out with a scalloped pie pan. Place rounds of dough on a cookie sheet and bake 12 to 15 minutes. Put together with sweetened well flavored applesauce.", "Makes about 9 layers.", "Let set a few hours before serving.", "May use apple butter."]

title: Gingerbread
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour or 1 2/3 c. cake flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "3/4 tsp. ginger", "1/2 tsp. allspice", "1/3 c. soft butter or margarine", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 egg", "1/2 c. light molasses", "1/2 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Sift flour, measure and resift 3 times with salt, soda and spices.", "Cream butter until smooth.", "Add sugar and egg and cream until light and fluffy.", "Add molasses and beat vigorously for 2 minutes longer.", "Add flour mixture and buttermilk alternately in 3 or 4 portions, beginning and ending with flour and beating well after each portion.", "Turn batter into a greased 11 x 7 x 1/2-inch pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes.", "Cool in pan on cake rack for 5 minutes, then turn out on rack and invert.", "Serve warm or cold.", "If glass dish is used, bake at 325\u00b0."]

title: Rhubarb Nut Bread
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. brown sugar", "2/3 c. vegetable oil", "1 egg", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 3/4 c. flour, spooned into cup", "1 1/2 c. chopped rhubarb", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts", "1 1/2 Tbsp. butter (room temperature)", "1/2 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Beat together (in a large bowl) brown sugar, egg and oil until creamy.", "Mix in soda, vanilla and milk. Add flour, rhubarb and nuts.", "Pour into 2 greased and floured loaf pans (8 x 4 1/2-inch). Dot tops with butter and sprinkle with sugar. Bake at 325\u00b0 for 1 hour until golden."]

title: Mama'S Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["1 heaping c. sugar", "1 c. butter or margarine", "2 eggs", "1 level tsp. soda", "3 Tbsp. buttermilk", "3 c. sifted all-purpose flour (plain) flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add eggs and beat well.", "Alternate dry ingredients with milk and vanilla.", "Mix well.", "Take about half of the dough and place on a floured board or clean countertop.", "Mix some more flour until it is not too sticky.", "Roll out thick and cut.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 on greased cookie sheet until done.", "Repeat for the other half of the dough.", "Recipe makes about 4 1/2 dozen tea cakes."]

title: Zucchini Dessert Squares
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. oil", "1 3/4 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. cocoa", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "2 c. grated, raw zucchini, drained", "chocolate bits", "walnuts"]
directions: ["In large bowl, cream butter, oil and sugar.", "Add eggs, one at a time.", "Blend in vanilla and buttermilk.", "In another bowl, combine flour, soda, baking powder, salt, cocoa and cinnamon.", "Add dry ingredients slowly to creamed mixture.", "Stir in zucchini. Spread on greased jellyroll pan.", "Sprinkle chocolate bits and walnuts over top and bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes.", "Cool. Cut into 2-inch squares.", "Makes 40 squares."]

title: Brunch Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. butter", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. baking soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Mix 1 cup of the flour with the sugar and salt. Cut in butter until mixture is crumbly. Set aside 1/2 cup of this mix for top. To remaining crumbs, add the other cup of flour sifted with baking powder and soda. Add buttermilk, egg and vanilla; blend thoroughly on low speed with mixer. Beat 1 minute more on medium speed. Pour into a greased 9 x 13 x 2-inch pan. Add cinnamon to crumb mixture reserved for topping. Sprinkle on top. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes."]

title: Buttermilk Pound Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. Crisco", "1/2 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "3 c. flour", "3 eggs", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. soda", "pinch of salt", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. lemon flavor"]
directions: ["Cream shortening.", "Add sugar and beat well.", "Add eggs one at a time.", "Add flour which has been sifted with soda and salt; add milk.", "Pour into a well-greased and floured pan.", "Bake 1 hour and 15 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Eggless Buttermilk Sugar Cookies
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter or shortening", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "5 1/4 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients until well blended.", "Roll out to 1/4-inch thickness and cut any desired shape. Sprinkle with a little sugar. Bake about 10 minutes at 400\u00b0."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. Wesson oil", "2 eggs", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. butter flavoring", "1 box powdered sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 pkg. cream cheese"]
directions: ["Mix well then spread on cake."]

title: Old-Fashioned Soft Cookies
ingredients: ["2 c. sifted flour", "1/2 tsp. baking soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. soft butter", "1/2 c. buttermilk or sour milk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg yolk", "1 egg white"]
directions: ["Sift together first 3 ingredients.", "Mix butter, sugar and egg yolk until fluffy.", "Mix in flour mixture alternately with buttermilk; then mix in vanilla.", "Fold in egg white, beaten stiff. Drop by tablespoonfuls 3 inches apart onto greased cookie sheet. Flatten with spatula to 1/2 inch thickness.", "Bake until golden brown in 350\u00b0 oven about 15 minutes.", "Yields 18 cookies."]

title: Rhubarb Muffins
ingredients: ["1 1/4 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. vegetable oil", "1 egg", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 c. finely diced rhubarb", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts", "1/4 tsp. black walnut flavoring", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. melted butter", "1/3 c. sugar and 1 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Combine brown sugar, oil, eggs, vanilla and buttermilk.", "Beat well.", "Stir in rhubarb, walnuts and black walnut flavoring.", "Sift together flour, soda, baking powder and salt.", "Add to the beaten mixture.", "Spoon into muffin tins which have been greased."]

title: Rhubarb Bread
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. brown sugar, firmly packed", "2/3 c. vegetable oil", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/2 c. flour", "2 c. rhubarb, diced", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts (optional)", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. butter or margarine"]
directions: ["Combine brown sugar and oil.", "Stir in egg, buttermilk, salt, soda, vanilla and flour; mix well.", "Fold in rhubarb and nuts.", "Pour into 2 greased and floured loaf pans.", "In a small bowl, combine sugar and margarine.", "Sprinkle over batter.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 to 55 minutes.", "Done when toothpicks come out clean.", "Cool and serve with margarine, cream cheese or Cool Whip.", "(May be frozen for 6 months.)"]

title: Apple Bread
ingredients: ["1/2 c. soft butter", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. all-purpose flour", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. buttermilk", "2 c. diced apples"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Pour into a greased and floured loaf pan.", "Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 1 hour or until done."]

title: Chocolate Crown Cake
ingredients: ["1 (6 oz.) pkg. semi-sweet chocolate chips", "1/2 c. graham cracker crumbs", "1/3 c. melted butter", "2 c. sifted flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 stick butter (1/2 c.)", "1 1/2 c. sugar plus 4 Tbsp. sugar (for whipped topping)", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/4 c. buttermilk", "1 pt. whipping cream", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Melt 1/3", "cup", "chocolate chips;", "set aside.", "Grease and flour bottoms of 2 (9-inch) cake pans.", "Combine graham cracker crumbs and melted\tbutter.", "Stir in walnuts and 2/3 cup chocolate chips; set", "aside.", "Combine", "flour,", "soda\tand", "salt; set aside.", "Cream butter, gradually", "add", "1", "1/2 cups sugar; cream well.", "Add eggs, one at a time, beating well. Blend in melted chocolate chips", "and vanilla.", "Add dry ingredients alternately with buttermilk (starting", "and", "ending with dry ingredients). Pour 1/2 batter into", "each pan.", "Sprinkle with crumb mixture. Bake at 375\u00b0 for", "30 to 40 minutes.", "Cool.", "Wrap in wax paper and", "refrigerate.", "Mix whipping", "cream", "for", "approximately", "2 minutes with 4 tablespoons sugar and put in between layers and on top of cake."]

title: Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 1/2 c. brown sugar", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. flour", "2 c. raw rhubarb, cut small pieces", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1/2 c. white sugar", "1 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add rest of ingredients to flour, mixing well, then add rhubarb.", "Put in 13 x 9-inch greased pan. Cover with topping made from nuts, white sugar and cinnamon.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes or until done."]

title: Old Fashion Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. rhubarb, chopped", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar; add egg.", "Beat well.", "Combine flour, baking soda and salt.", "Add alternately with buttermilk and vanilla to creamed mixture.", "Stir in rhubarb.", "Spread in a greased 9 x 13-inch baking pan."]

title: Thirty Minute Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 stick butter or margarine, softened", "1 sq. unsweetened chocolate or 2 1/2 Tbsp. cocoa", "1/2 c. boiling water", "1 c. sugar (more if using cocoa)", "1 scant c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 egg", "1/4 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["In bowl, cream sugar and margarine.", "Melt chocolate in boiling water.", "Pour over first mixture and stir.", "Add flour, soda, salt, egg, buttermilk and vanilla.", "Stir all together well.", "Bake in greased and floured 8 or 9-inch square pan at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

title: Coke Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "2 sticks butter", "1 c. Coke", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 eggs", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "1 1/2 c. miniature marshmallows"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Blend together flour and sugar.", "Set aside and boil the butter, Coke and cocoa.", "Pour over the flour and sugar and mix well.", "Add to the mixture buttermilk, eggs, salt, vanilla and soda; blend well.", "Add marshmallows.", "Mixture will be thin and marshmallows will float.", "Bake in", "a greased, floured pan for 30 to 40 minutes."]

title: Cinnamon Rolls
ingredients: ["1 c. buttermilk", "2 Tbsp. cooking oil", "3 Tbsp. sugar", "1/8 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 pkg. fast rising dry yeast", "1/4 c. warm water", "3 c. flour", "1 large egg", "softened butter", "2/3 c. brown sugar", "3 Tbsp. cinnamon", "3/4 c. raisins"]
directions: ["Heat", "buttermilk", "to", "lukewarm.", "Stir", "in", "cooking oil, sugar, soda and", "salt.", "Dissolve", "yeast in warm water.", "Add to buttermilk mixture, with unbeaten egg, stirring to blend.", "Mix in flour all at\tonce.", "Turn", "out", "on floured board and knead lightly", "for several minutes to form a smooth ball.", "Cover and let stand 5 or 10 minutes to tighten dough."]

title: Cocoa Drop Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. soft shortening (part butter)", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 3/4 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. cocoa", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Mix shortening, sugar and egg thoroughly.", "Stir in buttermilk and vanilla.", "Sift together and stir in the flour, soda, salt and cocoa.", "Mix in nuts, if desired.", "Chill dough at least 1 hour. Drop rounded teaspoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto lightly greased sheet.", "Bake for 8 to 10 minutes at 400\u00b0, or until almost no imprint remains when lightly touched."]

title: Buttermilk Pound Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "3 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 eggs"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and butter.", "Pour all ingredients in bowl, except buttermilk; mix well.", "Then add buttermilk and beat 15 minutes at medium speed.", "Pour in a greased tube pan.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 1 hour and 20 minutes."]

title: Buttermilk Brownies
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "2 sticks butter or margarine", "1 c. water", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 well beaten eggs", "1/2 c. buttermilk or sour milk", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Put butter, water and cocoa in pan.", "Bring to a boil.", "Sift flour, sugar and salt.", "Pour in boiled mixture.", "Add beaten eggs. Mix soda, milk and vanilla.", "Add to other ingredients.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes in an 11 x 15-inch pan."]

title: Swedish Rusks
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk or sour milk", "pinch of salt", "1 tsp. soda", "3 c. flour", "1/2 c. nuts, chopped"]
directions: ["Cream together sugar and butter.", "Beat egg into mixture.", "Add buttermilk or sour milk and pinch of salt with soda.", "Add flour alternately with nuts.", "Bake in slow oven.", "Cool about 1 hour. Cut in 3/4 x 4-inch slices and dry thoroughly in slow oven."]

title: Nanny'S Date Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. buttermilk, lukewarm", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "2 tsp. each: cinnamon, allspice and nutmeg", "1 lb. dates, cut fine", "3 c. flour", "2 c. pecans, chopped", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Sift 1/2 of the flour with soda, salt and spices.", "Use other half to dredge dates and nuts.", "Cream butter and sugar until fluffy.", "Add flour and buttermilk slowly.", "Mix well, then add nuts and dates.", "Bake in moderate (350\u00b0) oven for 1 hour."]

title: German Chocolate Pound Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. shortening/oleo", "4 eggs", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. butter flavoring", "1 c. buttermilk", "3 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 pkg. German sweet chocolate"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and shortening and add eggs, flavorings and buttermilk.", "Sift flour, soda and salt; add and mix well.", "Add German chocolate, that has been softened.", "Blend together well. Bake in well-greased and floured angel food or Bundt pan about 1 1/2 hours at 300\u00b0.", "Remove cake from pan while hot and place under tight fitting cake cover.", "Leave covered until cold.", "Ice with German Chocolate Pound Cake Glaze."]

title: Brownie Sheet Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1 stick butter", "3 1/2 Tbsp. cocoa", "1/2 c. oil", "1 c. water", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1/3 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Mix in saucepan:", "butter, cocoa, oil and water.", "Bring to a boil.", "Add flour first, then sugar.", "Mix. Add remaining ingredients and mix well.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 on greased and floured large cookie sheet for 20 minutes."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. Crisco shortening", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 tsp. soda", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 1/4 c. flour", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 oz. red food coloring", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 Tbsp. butter flavoring"]
directions: ["Cream shortening, sugar and eggs.", "Make a paste of the cocoa and coloring.", "Sift the dry ingredients; add to the creamed mixture and cocoa; mix alternately with milk.", "Add vanilla, soda and vinegar last.", "Pour into two greased and floured cake pans and bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. diced rhubarb", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. shortening", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour (unsifted)", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "dash of salt"]
directions: ["Mix rhubarb and 1/2 cup sugar; let stand.", "Cream together shortening and 1 1/2 cups sugar.", "Add egg; beat.", "Put soda and vanilla in buttermilk.", "Sift together flour, cinnamon and salt. Add dry ingredients alternately with milk, starting and ending with dry ingredients.", "Stir in rhubarb.", "Bake in greased 9 x 13-inch pan at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes.", "Serve with whipped cream topping."]

title: Mother'S Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. shortening", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 egg", "2 1/2 c. sifted flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Have all ingredients at room temperature.", "Cream together butter, shortening, sugar and flavoring.", "Add eggs and cream until fluffy.", "Sift together dry ingredients. Stir into mixture until smooth.", "Blend in buttermilk.", "Drop by teaspoonful onto greased cookie sheet. Flatten with bottom of glass dipped in sugar. Bake at 400\u00b0 for about 12 minutes. Cool.", "This will make about 5 dozen cookies."]

title: Texas Sheet Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "2 c. self-rising flour", "2 sticks butter", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 c. water", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 Tbsp. cocoa"]
directions: ["Combine flour, sugar and salt.", "In saucepan, bring to boil butter, water and cocoa.", "Pour over flour mixture.", "Blend eggs, soda, buttermilk and vanilla.", "Add to flour mixture.", "Mix well. Bake in greased and floured 15 1/2 x 10 1/2-inch pan for 20 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Candy Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sifted flour", "2 1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. shortening", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "100 bit marshmallows", "1/2 c. chocolate bits", "1/2 stick butter", "1/2 c. brown sugar, packed", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Sift together, flour, baking powder and salt.", "Cream together, shortening and sugar, added gradually.", "Beat in one egg, continue beating 1 minute.", "Combine buttermilk and vanilla; add alternately with dry ingredients to creamed mix.", "Fold in marshmallows and chocolate bits.", "Spread in greased 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Combine butter, brown sugar, nuts; sprinkle over batter and bake at 350\u00b0 for 40 to 45 minutes.", "Serve from pan with ice cream or whipped cream."]

title: Rhubarb Kuchen
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 stick butter or margarine", "1 egg", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. flour", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1 1/2 c. rhubarb, cut in small pieces (about 4 stalks)", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Mix together the first 7 ingredients.", "Add rhubarb and mix until combined.", "Pour batter into a greased and floured 9 x 13 x 2-inch pan.", "Combine 1/2 cup of sugar and cinnamon and sprinkle over the batter.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes or until done.", "Can be served with whipped cream or ice cream."]

title: Deep South Hush Puppies
ingredients: ["2 c. white corn meal", "1 Tbsp. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 egg, beaten", "3 Tbsp. onion, finely chopped", "1 1/4 c. buttermilk", "1/2 to 2 tsp. sugar", "solid Crisco or Crisco oil", "1 stick butter, softened"]
directions: ["Mix dry ingredients; add beaten egg, onion, buttermilk and sugar.", "Mix well.", "Melt enough shortening in a saucepan or deep skillet to make it 2 1/2-inches deep.", "Drop batter by teaspoon into hot (350\u00b0 to 380\u00b0) oil.", "Fry 4 to 6 hush puppies at a time. Cook until golden brown on both sides.", "Drain on brown paper."]

title: Old Fashioned Soft Sugar Cookies
ingredients: ["3 1/4 c. plain flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. shortening", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg, unbeaten", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Mix shortening, sugar and egg.", "Add vanilla and buttermilk, then dry ingredients.", "Roll out and cut into cookies.", "Bake on cookie sheet.", "Bake at 425\u00b0 for 12 minutes.", "Makes 2 1/2 dozen cookies.", "Do not overbake."]

title: Carrot Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. cinnamon", "1 c. oil", "3 egg", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. grated carrots", "1 small can crushed pineapple", "1 small can coconut", "1 c. chopped pecans"]
directions: ["Mix flour, sugar, salt, soda and cinnamon. Mix in buttermilk, oil and vanilla and mix well. Add carrots, pineapple, coconut and nuts.", "Pour into greased and floured 9 x 13 pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 35 minutes or until toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean."]

title: Billygoat Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "3 egg yolks", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/4 tsp. cloves", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "1/8 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. buttermilk", "4 c. chopped English walnuts", "1 lb. chopped dates"]
directions: ["Mix thoroughly, adding nuts and dates last.", "Drop by teaspoon onto baking sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for about 20 minutes."]

title: German Chocolate Pound Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "4 eggs", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk", "3 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 pkg. German chocolate"]
directions: ["Melt chocolate in butter.", "Cool and add rest of ingredients. Mix well and bake in prepared Bundt pan for 1 1/2 hours at 300\u00b0. Remove cake while hot and place under tight fitting cover until cool."]

title: Buttermilk Pound Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "3 c. sugar", "3 c. flour", "4 eggs", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/4 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["Cream", "butter and sugar.", "Add eggs, then vanilla, flour and salt.", "Mix\twell;", "add", "soda", "to buttermilk and stir well. Add to mixture", "and", "beat\t3 minutes.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour and 10 minutes.", "Add black walnuts, if desired."]

title: German Chocolate Pound Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. shortening", "4 eggs", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 tsp. butter flavoring", "1 c. buttermilk", "3 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 pkg. German sweet chocolate"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and shortening.", "Add eggs, vanilla, butter flavoring and buttermilk."]

title: Magic Butter Rolls
ingredients: ["3 c. bread flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. butter or oleo", "1/4 c. evaporated milk", "1/4 c. hot water", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "3 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. chopped nuts", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 cakes or pkg. yeast", "2 c. corn meal", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "6 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1 Tbsp. baking powder", "1 egg", "2 c. buttermilk", "red pepper to taste"]
directions: ["Mix all dry ingredients.", "Add chopped onion, then milk and egg, beaten together.", "Drop by small spoonfuls into boiling deep fat.", "They will float when done.", "Drain on brown paper.", "Serves 8."]

title: Tea Cookies
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter or shortening", "1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 Tbsp. buttermilk", "1/4 tsp. soda", "2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Mix well and roll out; cut in shapes.", "Bake at 250\u00b0."]

title: Rhubarb Coffee Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "2 c. brown sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 egg, well beaten", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "pinch of salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 c. raw rhubarb", "nuts (optional)", "1 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Cream shortening, 1 1/2 cups brown sugar and vanilla; add egg. Sift flour, soda and salt.", "Add sifted dry ingredients to creamed mixture alternately with buttermilk.", "Fold in rhubarb and nuts. Pour in greased 9 x 13 x 2-inch pan.", "Mix remaining brown sugar, cinnamon and ground or chopped nuts.", "Sprinkle over batter.", "Bake for 45 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Makes 8 servings."]

title: Tea Cake Cookies
ingredients: ["1 c. butter, softened", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. soda", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1 3/4 c. sugar", "1/4 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla", "4 c. plain flour"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar together then add eggs.", "Add milk and vanilla.", "Add salt, soda and enough flour to make it stiff.", "Spoon onto a greased cookie sheet by full teaspoons.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 minutes."]

title: Texas Sheet Cake
ingredients: ["4 Tbsp. cocoa (heaping)", "2 sticks butter", "1 c. water", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. soda", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 eggs, slightly beaten", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Combine cocoa, butter, water and sugar in a saucepan over medium heat.", "Stir frequently until mixture comes to a boil. While mixture is cooking, put dry ingredients in a large bowl. When cocoa mix boils, add it to the dry ingredients, mixing as you add.", "Add buttermilk, eggs and vanilla.", "Combine thoroughly, but do not beat.", "Pour into greased jelly roll pan (15 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 1 1/8-inch) and bake at 400\u00b0 for 20 minutes.", "Begin to prepare the frosting 5 minutes before the cake is done. Let cake stand 5 minutes and frost immediately."]

title: Mashed Potato Cake Dated 1868
ingredients: ["4 egg yolks", "1 c. butter", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "pinch of ginger", "1/4 c. cocoa powder", "1 c. mashed potatoes", "1 c. nuts", "1 c. raisins", "4 beaten egg whites"]
directions: ["Cream together egg yolks, butter and sugar.", "Add vanilla and buttermilk.", "Add flour, baking powder, salt, soda, cinnamon, ginger and cocoa powder.", "Add mashed potatoes, nuts and raisins. Fold in beaten egg whites last.", "Bake at 300\u00b0 for 1 1/2 hours."]

title: Hershey Bar Pound Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "4 eggs", "1 (5.5 oz.) can chocolate syrup", "7 (1.45 oz.) Hershey bars, melted", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 1/2 c. plain flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and butter; add eggs, one at a time, beating after each.", "Add syrup and melted candy bars.", "Add salt to flour, stir soda into buttermilk and add to other ingredients, alternating with flour, beginning and ending with flour.", "Add vanilla and pour into greased tube pan.", "Bake at 300\u00b0 for 1 1/2 hours."]

title: Coconut Crumb Cake
ingredients: ["2 1/4 c. flour", "1 c. sugar", "3/4 c. butter", "1 1/2 c. flaked coconut", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. cloves", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda"]
directions: ["In mixing bowl, mix flour and sugar; mix in butter until mealy.", "Mix 1 cup of mixture with 3/4 cup coconut (reserve).", "To the rest of the mixture add 3/4 cup coconut, salt, cinnamon and cloves.", "Stir together the milk and soda; add this to the mixture. Add egg and mix well with spoon.", "Pour into 9 x 13-inch pan. Sprinkle reserved crumb mixture on top.", "Bake in 375\u00b0 oven for 35 minutes."]

title: Mama'S Old Fashion Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "1 c. shortening", "1/3 c. buttermilk", "2 1/3 c. flour (self-rising or plain)", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/3 tsp. soda"]
directions: ["If you use self-rising flour, leave out salt.", "This was Grandma's old fashion \"tea cake.\"", "She rolled them out by hand like for biscuits.", "But she flattened them out and left her finger prints on them.", "I can see them now, where those three fingers left their imprint.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until brown."]

title: Buttermilk Brownies
ingredients: ["1 stick butter", "1 c. water", "1/4 c. cocoa", "1/2 c. oil", "2 eggs, beaten", "1 tsp. soda", "2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Combine butter, water, cocoa and oil in saucepan.", "Bring to a boil and pour over mixture of sifted flour, sugar, salt and soda. Mix. Add buttermilk, eggs and vanilla.", "Blend well.", "Pour into greased and floured pan, 11 x 16 x 1-inch.\tBake 12 to 15 minutes at 400\u00b0.", "Remove from oven and ice immediately with icing."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 oz. red coloring", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 1/2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Cream sugar, butter and vanilla.", "Add eggs one at a time and beat well.", "Make a paste of coloring and cocoa.", "Add to sugar mixture.", "Sift flour and salt.", "Add flour alternately with buttermilk.", "Combine soda and vinegar; add last and beat well. Bake at 350\u00b0 for about 30 minutes in 3 (9-inch) pans."]

title: Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. shortening (Crisco)", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk or sour cream", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. diced rhubarb", "1/2 c. nuts", "3 Tbsp. sugar", "2 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Mix together 1 1/2 cups sugar, shortening and egg.", "Alternately add buttermilk and flour, soda and salt (sifted together).", "Blend in vanilla, rhubarb and nuts.", "Pour into greased and floured 9 x 13-inch pan and sprinkle with 3 tablespoons sugar mixed with cinnamon.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for about 45 minutes.", "Very good for a brunch."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter flavor Crisco", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "2 c. flour", "1 Tbsp. cocoa", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 oz. red food coloring", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. soda", "1/4 c. flour", "1 c. milk", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 stick oleo", "1/2 c. butter Crisco"]
directions: ["Mix 1/2 cup butter Crisco, 1/2 cup sugar and eggs.", "Add 2 cups flour, cocoa, salt, 1 teaspoon vanilla, buttermilk and red food coloring.", "Mix soda and vinegar and add to above mixture.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: German Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1 pkg. German sweet chocolate", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 c. boiling water", "1 c. butter or oleo", "4 egg yolks, beaten", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "4 egg whites, stiffly beaten"]
directions: ["Melt chocolate in 1/2 cup boiling water.", "Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.", "Add egg yolks, one at a time, beating after each.", "Add vanilla and chocolate.", "Mix until blended."]

title: Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. margarine", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. walnuts, chopped", "1 1/2 c. raw rhubarb, diced", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Cream together first 8 ingredients, then fold in rhubarb and nuts.", "Pour into a 9 x 13 greased and floured pan.", "Mix cinnamon and 1/2 cup of sugar together and sprinkle on top of cake mixture. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes."]

title: "Sister Lint" Banana Nut Bread
ingredients: ["3 c. flour", "2 1/2 c. sugar", "2 sticks butter", "4 eggs", "8 Tbsp. buttermilk", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "pinch of salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. chopped nuts", "4 to 5 ripe bananas, mashed"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Grease 3 (2 pound) coffee cans. Pour mix into them.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 1 hour.", "Now you can freeze in cans and use later.", "You can use 3 small loaf pans if you prefer."]

title: Fresh Apple Cake
ingredients: ["3 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 c. oil", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3 c. diced apples", "1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "3 eggs", "1 c. black walnuts", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. raisins", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 stick butter"]
directions: ["Dust apples, nuts and raisins with flour; set aside.", "Mix oil, sugar, eggs and vanilla together.", "Beat well.", "Sift dry ingredients together; add to egg mixture.", "Mix well.", "Add apples, nuts and raisins.", "Stir well and pour into greased tube pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 1/2 hours."]

title: Billy Goats
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "3 egg yolks", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. cloves", "2 Tbsp. buttermilk", "4 c. chopped nuts", "1 lb. chopped dates"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar. Add egg yolks and vanilla. Sift together flour, soda, salt and all spices. Add dry ingredients to egg mixture with sour milk. Add nuts and dates. Drop on greased cookie sheet. Bake for 20 minutes at 325\u00b0."]

title: Heath Toffee Bars
ingredients: ["2 c. brown sugar", "2 c. all-purpose flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. chopped pecans", "6 Heath bars"]
directions: ["Sift flour, sugar and salt.", "Cut in shortening as in pie crust. Reserve 1 cup of this mixture.", "Add beaten egg and buttermilk in which soda has been dissolved and vanilla.", "Beat only until thoroughly mixed.", "Pour into greased 12 x 8-inch cake pan.", "Top with a cup of reserved mixture, nuts and chopped Heath bars.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes."]

title: Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 c. plain flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "2 c. fresh rhubarb, cut in small pieces"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and butter.", "Add egg; mix.", "Add dry ingredients and milk; mix well.", "Add rhubarb."]

title: Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 1/2 c. brown sugar", "1 egg", "2 c. flour, sifted", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 c. finely chopped rhubarb", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Cream butter and brown sugar together.", "Beat in egg.", "Sift flour, salt and soda; add to creamed mixture alternately with the buttermilk.", "Fold in rhubarb.", "Pour into greased 13 x 9-inch pan. Mix sugar and cinnamon together; sprinkle over batter.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes, or until browned."]

title: Old-Timey Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. butter", "1 3/4 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "1/4 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/8 tsp. salt", "4 c. flour (all-purpose)"]
directions: ["Measure out 4 cups of flour.", "Add gradually to other ingredients, until mixed.", "Do not make too dry.", "Bake in moderate oven at 350\u00b0 to 375\u00b0 oven."]

title: Rhubarb Muffins
ingredients: ["1 1/4 c. brown sugar, packed", "1/2 c. oil", "1 egg", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 c. rhubarb, diced", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["In mixer bowl, combine first 5 ingredients; beat well.", "With spoon, stir in rhubarb and nuts.", "In separate bowl, combine dry ingredients; stir into rhubarb mixture, just until blended.", "Spoon batter into 20 greased medium size muffin cups, filling 2/3 full."]

title: Banana Cakesante Fe, New Mexico
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1/3 c. sugar", "2 eggs, slightly beaten", "2 c. sifted flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg", "1/3 c. buttermilk", "1 c. mashed banana", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/3 c. crushed corn flakes", "1/4 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. soft butter", "1/4 c. chopped walnuts"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar, add eggs and beat thoroughly.", "Sift together flour, soda, salt and nutmeg.", "Stir into creamed mixture. Stir in buttermilk, bananas and vanilla.", "Spread in greased pan. Sprinkle with topping:", "Corn flakes, sugar, butter and nuts.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes."]

title: Rhubarb Bread
ingredients: ["2 cups brown sugar", "2/3 cup liquid shortening", "1 cup buttermilk", "1 egg", "1 tsp salt", "1 tsp vanilla", "2 1/2 cups flour", "1 tsp soda", "1 1/2 cup rhubarb", "1/2 cup nutmeats"]
directions: ["Stir all ingredients in order given. Pour into 2 greased floured loaf pans. Bake 1 hour in 325\u00b0 oven. While still warn brush on glaze topping."]

title: Rolls
ingredients: ["1 pkg. RapidRise dry yeast", "1/4 c. warm water", "1/2 stick butter", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 beaten egg", "3 c. flour"]
directions: ["Mix yeast and warm water together; set aside.", "Melt butter; add buttermilk.", "Add yeast mixture to lukewarm liquid.", "Add salt, sugar, soda and beaten egg.", "Stir in 1 cup flour.", "Beat all together and add 2 cups flour.", "Put dough in greased bowl and leave in a cool placed until 2 hours prior to serving.", "Roll out and cut.", "Grease tops and bottoms with butter; fold in half. Place in pans and let rise at room temperature.", "Bake at 450\u00b0 about 10 to 15 minutes."]

title: German Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "4 beaten egg yolks", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 pkg. German chocolate", "1/2 c. hot water", "4 beaten egg whites", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream the sugar, butter and egg yolks.", "Mix together the flour, salt, chocolate and 1/2 cup of hot water.", "Fold in egg whites last.", "Mix together.", "Mix together the buttermilk, soda and vanilla.", "Mix as you would any cake.", "Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven."]

title: Lacy'S Teacakes
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 tsp. soda", "1/4 c. buttermilk", "4 c. plain or all-purpose flour", "2 eggs", "pinch of salt", "1 3/4 c. sugar", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix all of the ingredients except flour together. Measure out 4 cups flour and add gradually until the dough is the right consistency to roll. Do not make dough too dry. Roll the dough out thin and cut in desired shapes. Bake at 350\u00b0 for about 12 minutes. Sprinkle sugar on top of each teacake."]

title: Helen'S Delight Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "2 c. flour", "1 stick butter (1/2 c.)", "1/2 c. shortening", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 c. water", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 eggs", "dash of salt"]
directions: ["Mix together sugar and flour in a large bowl.", "In a saucepan, bring butter, shortening, cocoa and water to a boil.", "Pour mixture over the flour and sugar.", "Mix well.", "Add soda, buttermilk, cinnamon, vanilla, eggs and a dash of salt.", "Bake for 20 minutes at 400\u00b0 in greased shallow pan."]

title: Banana Nut Bread
ingredients: ["3/4 c. butter", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. bananas, mashed", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "3/4 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. walnuts"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Blend in bananas, eggs and vanilla. Sift flour, soda and salt; add to banana mixture alternately with buttermilk, mixing well after each addition.", "Add nuts and mix. Pour into two loaf pans, greased and floured.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 1 1/4 hours."]

title: Peanut Butter Sour Cream Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "dash of salt", "dash of nutmeg", "1/4 tsp. soda", "2 1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 c. peanut butter", "6 Tbsp. butter", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. almond extract", "3 eggs", "8 oz. sour cream", "1/4 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Sift the first 5 ingredients together.", "Mix remaining ingredients in large bowl of electric mixer.", "Beat on cream cycle until smooth and light.", "Add dry ingredients.", "Mix until well blended and smooth.", "Pour into 3 well-greased small loaf pans. Bake at 350\u00b0 until cake breaks from side or toothpick comes out clean 50 to 60 minutes for large cake or 40 to 50 minutes for small cakes."]

title: Black Magic Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter or margarine, cut up", "4 eggs", "1/4 c. chocolate syrup", "2 1/2 c. flour", "8 Milky Way Candy bars, cut up", "3/4 c. cocoa", "2 c. sugar", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Grease bundt pan. In microwave safe bowl; combine butter, syrup and Milky Ways. Heat 5 to 5 1/2 minutes, whisking once then beat until smooth. Whisk in sugar, buttermilk, vanilla and eggs. Stir in flour, cocoa, salt and soda. Pour batter into pan. Bake 1 1/2 hours or until toothpick comes out clean. Cool in pan on wire rack 10 minutes. Loosen cake from pan; invert unto rack to cool completely."]

title: Blackberry Jam Cake
ingredients: ["6 whole eggs", "1 c. butter", "2 1/3 c. sugar", "2 c. blackberry jam", "1 c. nuts, chopped", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "2 tsp. allspice", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 tsp. baking powder", "4 c. flour (plain)", "1 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Sift dry ingredients together.", "Beat eggs well together.", "Add dry ingredients to butter and sugar mixture alternately with buttermilk and beaten eggs.", "Add blackberry jam, nuts and vanilla.", "Grease and lightly flour four 9-inch cake pans.", "Pour in cake batter and bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes or until cake springs back from light pressure of finger."]

title: Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ["2/3 c. and 1 Tbsp. sugar", "1/4 c. butter", "1/4 c. buttermilk", "3/4 c. peanut butter", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/4 c. all-purpose flour", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
directions: ["In a medium bowl combine 2/3 cup sugar, butter and buttermilk.", "Beat until creamy.", "Add peanut butter, egg and vanilla.", "Mix well.", "In a medium bowl combine flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt.", "Stir into the peanut butter mixture.", "Drop the dough by full teaspoons onto ungreased baking sheet.", "Flatten the dough with fork dipped in the remaining sugar. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes or until lightly browned."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["3 sticks butter, softened", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "1 oz. red food coloring", "2 Tbsp. salt", "2 1/3 c. flour", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vinegar", "8 oz. cream cheese (soft)", "1 lb. confectioners sugar", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Cream 2 sticks butter and 1 teaspoon vanilla in bowl.", "Add sugar, 1/3 cup at a time, beating well after each addition.", "Beat in eggs, 1 at a time, beating well after each.", "Stir in next 2 ingredients, mixing well.", "Add flour, 1/3 cup at a time, alternately with buttermilk, beating well after each addition, beginning and ending with flour.", "Combine soda and vinegar.", "Add to batter, mixing well.", "Pour into 3 prepared pans.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes or until cake tests done."]

title: Drop Sugar Cookies
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter or lard", "1 c. buttermilk", "3 eggs", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "4 1/2 c. flour"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and shortening.", "Add eggs, 1 at a time, and mix well.", "Add vanilla.", "Add sifted flour, soda, baking powder and salt alternately with buttermilk.", "Drop on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 350\u00b0 to 375\u00b0."]

title: Peanut Butter Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. water", "1/2 stick butter", "1/2 c. oil", "1/2 c. peanut butter", "2 c. plain flour", "2 c. sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix flour, sugar, salt, soda and buttermilk.", "Beat eggs; add to flour mixture.", "Add with boiled mixture.", "Add vanilla.", "Mix well."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. shortening", "2 eggs", "2 oz. red food coloring", "2 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 1/4 c. sifted flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 tsp. butter flavoring"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and shortening.", "Add eggs and blend.", "Make a paste with food coloring and cocoa.", "Add to mixture.", "Alternately add flour, salt, buttermilk and vanilla. Mix soda and vinegar in small bowl and add to batter.", "Add butter flavor and blend.", "Bake in two 8-inch greased and floured pans for 30 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Fruit Preserves Pound Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. shortening", "2 c. sugar", "4 large eggs", "1 tsp. each: almond and vanilla flavoring", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. each: salt, soda, nutmeg and allspice", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 c. pecans, chopped", "1 c. fruit preserves (which have been mashed)", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Combine all ingredients and bring to boil; let boil slowly for 5 minutes.", "Put on cake while still hot."]

title: German Chocolate Pound Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. shortening", "4 eggs", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 tsp. butter flavoring", "3 c. sifted all-purpose flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 (4 oz.) pkg. sweet chocolate, softened"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and shortening until light and fluffy.", "Add eggs, flavorings and buttermilk; mix well.", "Sift flour, soda and salt together; stir into creamed mixture.", "Blend in chocolate.", "Pour into a greased and floured 9-inch tube pan.", "Bake at 300\u00b0 for 1 1/2 hours.", "Place under tight-fitting cake cover while still hot. Leave covered until cool."]

title: Buttermilk Pound Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "3 c. flour", "4 eggs", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add eggs, beating after each addition.", "Add sifted dry ingredients alternately with buttermilk, beating after each addition.", "Pour into Bundt pan.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 to 350\u00b0 for 1 hour."]

title: German Chocolate Pound Cake
ingredients: ["1 German sweet chocolate bar", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. shortening", "4 eggs", "2 tsp. vanilla", "3 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. butter flavoring", "1 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Melt chocolate.", "Cream shortening and sugar.", "Add eggs one at a time.", "Add flavoring; mix well.", "Sift dry ingredients.", "Add alternately with buttermilk.", "Fold in chocolate.", "Pour into well greased and floured Bundt pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 1/2 hours. Remove from pan.", "Place hot cake under tight fitting cake cover until cold."]

title: Pineapple Cake
ingredients: ["1 stick butter", "1/2 c. vegetable shortening", "2 c. sugar", "5 egg yolks", "2 c. plain flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk", "5 egg whites, stiffly beaten"]
directions: ["Cream butter and shortening; add sugar and beat well.", "Add egg yolks.", "Combine flour, soda and salt.", "Add to creamed mixture alternately with buttermilk.", "Blend in vanilla.", "Fold in the stiffly beaten egg whites.", "Pour batter into four greased and floured 9-inch cake pans.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 minutes.", "Cool and frost."]

title: Chocolate Pound Cake
ingredients: ["2 small cans chocolate syrup", "1 c. butter", "1 big chocolate Hershey bar", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. soda", "2 c. sugar", "4 eggs", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and butter.", "Add eggs, one at a time.", "Beat well. Add syrup and melted candy bar.", "Add salt and flour.", "Stir soda into buttermilk.", "Alternate flour and milk, stirring well after each addition.", "Add vanilla."]

title: Grandma Ayes Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. buttermilk", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "3 c. flour", "2 tsp. vanilla", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 c. boiling water", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. baking powder"]
directions: ["Mix all the ingredients.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Chocolate Sheet Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "2 c. flour", "2 sticks butter", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "1 c. water", "dash of salt", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 eggs", "1 stick butter", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "6 Tbsp. milk", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Add 1 box powdered sugar and 1 cup nuts.", "Spread on while cake is hot."]

title: Grandma Frey'S Russian Peppernuts
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "2 Tbsp. Crisco", "cinnamon", "cloves", "allspice", "1 c. molasses", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "1 c. raisins", "1 c. walnuts", "3 sour apples", "1 c. sugar", "3/4 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 egg, beaten", "1/2 c. milk", "1 Tbsp. melted butter"]
directions: ["Peel, core and chop apples.", "Mix chopped apples with sugar. Make drop batter by sifting flour, salt and baking powder together, adding beaten egg and milk.", "Stir in melted butter and mix apple pieces in batter until every piece is coated."]

title: Stack Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. shortening", "1/2 c. molasses", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "5 c. all-purpose flour", "1 tsp. soda", "2 Tbsp. baking powder", "1/8 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. ginger"]
directions: ["Melt 1 cup shortening in saucepan.", "Add 1/2 cup molasses, 1 cup sugar and 1 cup buttermilk.", "Warm over medium heat, then remove to cool.", "Add 1 egg and 1 teaspoon vanilla."]

title: Chocolate Zucchini Cake
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. flour", "1/4 c. Hershey's dry cocoa", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. butter or stick margarine", "1/2 c. cooking oil", "1 3/4 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 c. buttermilk or sour milk", "2 eggs", "2 c. grated zucchini", "1 (6 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips", "3/4 c. chopped nuts"]
directions: ["Sift dry ingredients together and set aside.", "Cream butter, oil and sugar until fluffy.", "Beat in eggs.", "Add vanilla and dry ingredients.", "Add buttermilk.", "Stir in zucchini.", "Pour into a 9 x 13-inch greased pan.", "Sprinkle with chocolate chips and nuts. Bake at 325\u00b0 for 55 minutes or until tested done."]

title: Cherry Pecan Bread
ingredients: ["3/4 c. butter", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "3 eggs", "2 1/4 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "3/4 c. pecans, chopped", "1 (10 oz.) jar chopped maraschino cherries", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. almond extract"]
directions: ["Cream softened butter. Gradually add sugar, beating well. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Combine flour, soda and salt; add to creamed mixture alternately with buttermilk, beginning and ending with flour mixture. Stir in the pecans and cherries. Pour batter into a greased and floured 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour and 15 to 20 minutes or until tested done. Cool in pan 10 minutes. Remove from pan."]

title: Frosted Molasses Creams
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "1 c. light molasses", "1 c. buttermilk", "4 1/2 c. flour", "2 tsp. soda", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and molasses.", "Add buttermilk, vanilla and flour sifted with soda and salt.", "Mix well.", "Refrigerate overnight.", "Roll out 1/8-inch thick.", "Cut out with cookie cutter. Bake at 375\u00b0 about 8 to 10 minutes.", "Do not grease cookie sheet. Makes a lot of cookies.", "Frost with 1 recipe Seven Minute Icing."]

title: Chocolate Bread
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "5 eggs, beaten well", "2 sq. melted chocolate", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 c. walnuts (optional)"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar together well.", "Add eggs, melted chocolate and vanilla.", "Add flour, soda, salt and buttermilk. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes.", "Makes 2 loaf pans."]

title: Buttermilk Doughnuts
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. sugar", "4 eggs", "1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. milk", "2 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "3 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. nutmeg", "flour to roll"]
directions: ["Roll out and cut with doughnut cutter.", "Deep fry at 325\u00b0 until brown, turning once.", "Drain on paper towels."]

title: German Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1 (4 oz.) pkg. Baker's German's chocolate", "1/2 c. water", "2 c. all-purpose flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. butter, softened (2 sticks)", "2 c. sugar", "4 egg yolks", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. buttermilk", "4 egg whites", "Coconut-Pecan Frosting"]
directions: ["Heat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Line bottom of 3 (9-inch) layer pans with waxed paper.", "Microwave chocolate and water in large bowl on High 1 1/2 to 2 minutes or until chocolate is almost melted.", "Stir until chocolate is completely melted."]

title: Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 1/2 c. brown sugar", "1 egg", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. sour milk", "2 c. chopped rhubarb", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1/4 to 1/2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. cinnamon"]
directions: ["Cream the butter and sugar.", "Add egg and vanilla, then add flour, soda, salt and sour milk.", "Stir in rhubarb.", "Mix the last 3 ingredients; sprinkle on top.", "Bake for 45 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Red Velvet Cake And Frosting
ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "1 c. butter or margarine", "1 oz. red food coloring", "2 1/2 c. plain flour", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Make a paste of cocoa and vinegar; set aside.", "Cream sugar and buttermilk.", "Add eggs and beat until very fluffy.", "Add paste. Sift flour, soda and salt together.", "Add buttermilk and sugar mixture, vanilla, food coloring and flour to batter.", "Add flour, a little at a time, mixing well after each addition until all is used.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 in 9 x 12-inch pan or two 9-inch round pans for 30 minutes."]

title: Rhubarb Cupcakes
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. brown sugar", "2/3 c. liquid shortening", "1 egg", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "2 2/3 c. flour", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. finely chopped rhubarb", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1/2 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. melted butter"]
directions: ["Bake in 325\u00b0", "oven for 40 minutes.", "Do not overbake.", "Makes 18 to 24 cupcakes."]

title: Chocolate Cookie Sheet Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 sticks butter", "1 c. water", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 eggs, well beaten", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda"]
directions: ["Sift flour, measure and sift again with sugar and salt.", "Put butter, water and cocoa in a saucepan and bring to a boil.", "Pour over dry mixture.", "Mix eggs, soda, buttermilk and vanilla and add to flour mixture.", "Mix well.", "Bake in a greased and floured 15 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 1-inch pan for 20 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Start making frosting the last 5 minutes cake is cooking."]

title: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "2 c. all-purpose flour, sifted", "2 sticks butter", "1 c. water", "3 1/2 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Mix sugar and flour.", "In saucepan, bring to a boil, butter, water and cocoa.", "Add this to flour and sugar mixture.", "Mix well. Add eggs, buttermilk, soda, salt and vanilla; mix well.", "Cook in greased 11 x 16-inch pan at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes."]

title: Persimmon Pudding
ingredients: ["3 c. persimmon pulp", "1 1/4 c. sugar", "2 1/2 c. plain flour", "1/2 c. margarine or butter", "2 eggs", "2 tsp. cinnamon", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp.salt", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "1 c. persimmon pulp", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 c. plain flour", "2 eggs", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 to 1 stick butter"]
directions: ["Melt butter in a 9 x 13-inch baking dish or pan.", "Mix together all dry ingredients and add to persimmon pulp, buttermilk and eggs. Add butter.", "Add vanilla.", "Pour into baking dish.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for around 30 minutes or until done."]

title: Jam Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 1/2 flour", "5 eggs", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. seedless blackberry jam", "1 c. raisins", "1 c. coconut", "1 tsp. nutmeg", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. allspice", "1 c. crushed pineapple"]
directions: ["Cream butter, sugar and eggs.", "Mix soda and buttermilk. Blend in egg mixture.", "Add flour slowly.", "Cook raisins and add to mixture along with other ingredients.", "Spray 3 round cake pans with cooking spray (I prefer Baker's Joy cooking spray).", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes."]

title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter", "1 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 1/2 c. flour", "2 oz. red food coloring", "1 c. buttermilk", "3 eggs", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/2 Tbsp. salt", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. baking powder", "2 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and butter.", "Add eggs.", "Combine vinegar, cocoa and food coloring together.", "Add to mixture of sugar, butter and eggs."]

title: Mound Cake(Top Money Maker At Auction)
ingredients: ["4 c. sugar", "1 c. butter or margarine", "5 eggs", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 rounded tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "4 sq. chocolate, melted", "1 tsp. vanilla", "16 oz. Cool Whip", "36 oz. coconut, frozen", "16 oz. sour cream"]
directions: ["Cream butter and 2 cups of sugar, adding eggs one at a time. Beat after each addition.", "Sift dry ingredients together and add alternately with buttermilk.", "Add chocolate and vanilla.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes.", "Cool."]

title: German Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1 (4 oz.) pkg. German sweet chocolate", "1/2 c. boiling water", "1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "5 eggs, separated", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 1/4 c. sifted all-purpose flour", "1 c. buttermilk", "Coconut-Pecan Frosting (recipe follows)"]
directions: ["Melt chocolate in boiling water.", "Allow to cool.", "Cream butter and sugar (see Note) until light and fluffy.", "Add egg yolks, one at a time, beating well after each.", "Blend in vanilla and cooled chocolate."]

title: German Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1 (4 oz.) pkg. Baker's German's sweet chocolate", "1/2 c. boiling water", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. butter", "4 egg yolks", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/4 c. unsifted plain flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "4 egg whites, stiffly beaten"]
directions: ["Melt chocolate in boiling water.", "Cool.", "Cream butter and sugar until fluffy.", "Add yolks, one at a time; beat well after each. Blend in vanilla and chocolate."]

title: Double Cake
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "3 c. flour", "1 c. buttermilk or sweet or sour", "4 eggs", "1/2 tsp. soda", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. almond or orange extract"]
directions: ["Combine butter, sugar, flour and buttermilk.", "Beat two minutes. Add eggs, one at a time.", "Beat two more minutes.", "Add soda, salt, baking powder, vanilla and extract.", "Pour into a greased and floured Bundt pan or two bread pans.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 minutes."]

title: Banana Nut Cake
ingredients: ["3/4 c. butter or oleo", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. mashed ripe bananas", "2 c. sifted flour", "1/4 c. tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk or sour milk", "2 eggs, separated", "1/2 c. chopped nuts, dredged in flour", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and butter, add 2 egg yolks and beat well.", "Add bananas, combine flour with soda and salt, add alternately with buttermilk.", "Add vanilla and nuts; fold in 2 stiffly beaten egg whites.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 in two 9-inch cake pans for 30 minutes. Frost with unsweetened whipped cream."]

title: Irish Soda Bread
ingredients: ["4 c. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "3 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. soda", "1/4 c. sugar (optional)", "1/8 tsp. cardamon or coriander (optional)", "1/4 c. butter", "2 c. raisins (optional)", "1 egg", "1 3/4 c. buttermilk (or milk with 5 tsp. vinegar)"]
directions: ["Combine dry ingredients.", "Cut in butter until crumbly. Add raisins (soak in hot water and drain first).", "Mix egg and buttermilk.", "Add to dry ingredients.", "Turn onto floured board and knead 2 to 3 minutes. Divide dough in half. Shape into loaves.", "In 8-inch round pans, press dough to fill pans.", "With a sharp knife, cut crosses on tops about 1/2-inch deep in the middle. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 35 to 40 minutes.", "Serve warm or cold.", "Makes 2 loaves."]

title: Grandmother'S Tea Cakes
ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "3 Tbsp. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 level tsp. soda", "1 c. butter or Crisco", "3 c. sifted flour", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
directions: ["Cream butter and sugar.", "Add eggs.", "Alternate dry ingredients with milk and add vanilla.", "Roll out thin; cut.", "Sprinkle sugar over top and bake at 350\u00b0 until done."]

title: Ruby'S Buttermilk Pound Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. Crisco", "1 c. butter", "3 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda", "2 tsp. vanilla", "3 eggs", "1 c. buttermilk"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients in bowl, except buttermilk.", "Mix well. Add buttermilk and beat 15 minutes.", "Do not underbeat.", "Bake 1 hour at 350\u00b0."]

title: Rhubarb Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1 egg", "2 c. flour", "1 c. raw rhubarb (1-inch pieces)", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 c. buttermilk or cultured sour cream makes this cake extra delicious"]
directions: ["Cream sugar and shortening; add egg.", "Sift and measure dry ingredients.", "Add alternately with buttermilk or sour cream. Spread some rhubarb in bottom of 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Add remaining rhubarb to batter and spread over pan.", "Top with 2/3 cup sugar and 2 teaspoons cinnamon (well mixed).", "Bake 40 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Grandma'S German Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1 bar Baker's German's chocolate", "1/2 c. boiling water", "1 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "4 eggs, separated", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 1/2 c. Pet milk", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "4 egg yolks", "1 c. margarine", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. coconut", "1 1/2 c. pecans"]
directions: ["Melt chocolate in boiling water; cool.", "Cream butter and sugar together; add egg yolks one at a time, beating after each addition.", "Add vanilla and melted chocolate and mix until blended. Sift flour with soda and salt and add alternately with buttermilk.", "Fold in stiffly beaten egg whites and pour batter into 3 greased and floured 8-inch pans and bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes.", "Mix Pet milk, sugar, egg yolks, margarine and vanilla; cook and stir over medium heat 12 minutes, until mixture thickens.
